translation.en: [man 1] Gunther, Bola,
thank you for joining us here in our bubble.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们加入我们的泡泡剧组

translation.en: As the producer on this movie, here's what I expect from you.
translation.zh:
‎作为这部电影的制片人
‎以下是我对你们的期望

translation.en: -Actors are animals. -[woman scoffs]
You are animal handlers.
Sometimes, they wanna play with you. Sometimes, they'll rip your balls off.
translation.zh: ‎有时 他们想跟你们玩 ‎有时 他们会把你们的蛋蛋扯下来

translation.en: Don't listen to anything they say. They're liars.
translation.zh: ‎别信他们的任何话 他们都是骗子

translation.en: They literally lie for a living. That's their literal job, yeah?
translation.zh:
‎他们就是以说谎谋生的
‎这是他们的真实工作 好吗？

translation.en: Don't party with them.
Don't tire them out.
Don't fuck them.
I won't.
Always tell them they're fantastic in the movie.
translation.zh:
‎要不停地告诉他们
‎他们在电影里演得很棒

translation.en: They're very insecure people. They need constant praise.
translation.zh:
‎他们都是极其没有安全感的人
‎需要持续的表扬

translation.en: Make them feel good. Don't tire them out. Don't fuck them. Don't fuck them.
translation.zh:
‎要让他们感觉良好 别把他们累坏了
‎别跟他们上床

translation.en: -[man 1] That's it. -That's it.
Any questions?
Um… Yeah, like, what if we become proper friends?
-You won't. -[man 2] No?
No.
What if they confide in you
and tell you something they've not told anybody else?
translation.zh: ‎跟我说了没对别人讲过的秘密呢？

translation.en: Call me, tell me what they said.
translation.zh: ‎给我打电话 告诉我他们说了什么

translation.en: -What if they say, "Don't tell Gavin"? -[Gavin] No!
translation.zh:
‎-假如他们说“不能告诉加文”呢？
‎-不会的！

translation.en: -No. -This is the bubble.
The sanctuary!
It's the only place they're safe! That's why you're not wearing masks.
translation.zh:
‎这是他们唯一安全的地方！
‎所以你们才没戴口罩

translation.en: Don't you get it?
-[woman] Hi! -Hey! [laughs]
-[woman laughing] How are you? -So good to see you!
-Well, imagine… -[woman] Okay, yes.
-Fake hug. -[man] Oh, wow. You look fantastic!
translation.zh:
‎-假想拥抱
‎-哇 你气色真好！

translation.en: [woman] Thanks. Been exercising a lot. It's the only thing keeping me sane.
translation.zh:
‎谢谢 我一直在锻炼
‎这是我保持理智的唯一方法

translation.en: Well, you look sane and gorgeous, and, uh…
translation.zh: ‎你看起来既理智又美丽 还有…

translation.en: -What do you think about Cliff Beasts 6? -I can't leave my boyfriend right now.
translation.zh:
‎-你想不想拍《悬崖野兽6》？
‎-我现在不能离开男友

translation.en: He is very neurotic, and this whole time is just very triggering for him.
translation.zh:
‎他非常神经质
‎他这段时间就像惊弓之鸟一样

translation.en: Huh. Okay. What if you brought him?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那你带他进组如何？

translation.en: -He won't travel. -Because of the pandemic?
translation.zh:
‎-不行 他不肯旅行
‎-是因为疫情吗？

translation.en: No, he just won't fly. He also refuses to get a job.
translation.zh: ‎不是 他坐不了飞机 他也不想找工作

translation.en: I have a lot of clients working in bubbles right now, and they're having a blast.
translation.zh:
‎我现在有很多演员客户
‎在泡泡剧组工作 他们很是开心

translation.en: It won't be comfortable working with them.
They hate me for not doing Cliff Beasts 5. I can't bubble with them for three months.
translation.zh:
‎他们都恨我没拍《悬崖野兽5》
‎我没法和他们一起在泡泡待三个月

translation.en: I'm gonna level with you.
translation.zh: ‎我就跟你说实话了 好吗？

translation.en: You need a rebound after your last film, Jerusalem Rising.
translation.zh:
‎演完上部电影《耶路撒冷崛起》后
‎你需要强势复出

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -You saw the reviews.
-I never read my reviews. -Hang on a sec.
translation.zh:
‎-我从来不读自己的影评
‎-稍等

translation.en: -Can you not read those? -Just listen, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-可以别这样吗？
‎-你听着就好 好吗？

translation.en: "Jerusalem Rising manages to offend both Palestinians and Jews."
translation.zh:
‎“《耶路撒冷崛起》成功地
‎同时冒犯到了巴勒斯坦人和犹太人”

translation.en: That's one review. And it was the script. It wasn't my fault.
translation.zh:
‎只是一条评论而已！
‎是剧本的错 又不是我的错！

translation.en: When Cats bombed, they didn't blame Andrew Lloyd Webber.
translation.zh:
‎《猫》遭到炮轰时
‎他们没有责怪安德鲁洛伊德韦伯

translation.en: They just said, "Judi Dench fucked Cats."
translation.zh:
‎他们只会说
‎“朱迪丹奇把《猫》给毁了”

translation.en: Okay, but you were the one who told me
translation.zh: ‎好吧 但当初是你告诉我

translation.en: I could play half-Israeli and half-Palestinian when I'm neither.
translation.zh: ‎我可以演以色列和巴勒斯坦混血 ‎哪怕这两种血统我都没有

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] I know you've been fighting for thousands of years,
translation.zh: ‎我知道你们几千年来一直都是死敌

translation.en: but tonight, we must join forces to fight the aliens.
translation.zh:
‎但是今晚 我们必须联合起来
‎共同对抗外星人

translation.en: [in normal accent] Is my career dead?
Not if you make this movie.
And it's safe?
The safest place in the world right now is a film set.
translation.zh:
‎现在全世界最安全的地方
‎就是电影片场

translation.en: The script is actually good?
It made me cry.
Oh, you're making the face like you're gonna say yes.
Oh, my God, Josh is gonna have a full nervous breakdown.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 乔希一定会彻底精神崩溃

translation.en: I can do this, right?
I'll keep my head down, not get pulled into the drama,
translation.zh: ‎我会低调行事 不掺和狗血

translation.en: and just do my job and get out.
All right. Okay, let's do it. Yeah, put me in the bubble.
translation.zh: ‎好的 我加入 安排我进泡泡剧组吧

translation.en: -[Carol] Hi! -[man 2] Carol. What's up, movie star?
translation.zh:
‎-嗨！
‎-嘿 卡罗尔 你好啊 大影星

translation.en: This is so crazy. You sure you're gonna be okay?
translation.zh: ‎这也太疯狂了 你确定会没事吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I guess I'm just worried about catching the virus, but…
translation.zh:
‎没事 我只是很担心会感染病毒
‎但是…

translation.en: Well, just call me regularly.
Actually, I just heard that veterinarians are gonna start treating people,
translation.zh:
‎其实 我最近听说兽医
‎要开始治疗人类了

translation.en: so that'll help.
Yeah, and it's only three months. Three months! We can do this!
translation.zh: ‎对 只是三个月而已 我们可以的！

translation.en: Oh, wait! Somebody wants to say hi!
Okay.
Look who it is!
I miss you so much, Mommy.
Aw. I'm not your mommy yet, Leila,
but I will be your stepmom one day. It'll be the best!
translation.zh:
‎但总有一天我会成为你继母
‎那就太好了！

translation.en: -Daddy said you left us for dead. -Oh, what?
translation.zh:
‎-爸爸说你丢下我们不管
‎-什么？

translation.en: -[laughs] Don't forget about us! Bye! -Bye!
-[Carol] Hey! Nice to meet you! -Hiya! I'm Pippa, production coordinator.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！很高兴见到你！
‎-你好！我是皮帕 制片协调员

translation.en: Oh. Shall we? [chuckles] Welcome to Clifton House.
translation.zh: ‎来碰个肘 欢迎来到克利夫顿酒店

translation.en: -[Carol] This is amazing. -[Pippa] I know, right?
-Carol, we're so excited you're here! -[Carol] I'm so excited to get started!
translation.zh: ‎卡罗尔 我们很高兴你能过来！ ‎我很高兴能开始拍摄了！

translation.en: -[Gavin] Wow! You look great. -[Carol] Oh, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎哇 你气色好极了 ‎-谢谢
‎-你要先做个新冠核酸检测

translation.en: -Now, you just have to do a COVID test. -[Carol] Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢
‎-你要先做个新冠核酸检测 ‎好的

translation.en: -[Gunther] I'm such a big fan. -[Carol] Thank you. [chuckles]
[Gunther] And in your nose. Okay.
-[Carol] Mm. -[Gunther] Ready? One hundred.
Ninety-nine.
-Ninety-eight. -Uh…
-I'm only joking. -Oh!
-[chuckling] Oh, my God! You're the worst! -[Gunther] See you in a bit. Bye, friend.
[Carol] Bye. Whoo! Yeah.
Um, so how does the quarantining work?
It's a quick 14 days. We pamper you.
translation.zh: ‎就是短短的14天 我们会精心照顾你

translation.en: Wait till you see what we've done to your room.
translation.zh:
‎等着看我们把你的房间
‎布置成了什么样吧

translation.en: -[Pippa] You have the best room by far. -[Carol] I love that.
translation.zh:
‎-目前你的房间是最好的
‎-我好开心

translation.en: -Ah! Bola! -[Bola] Hello.
This is Bola, our wellness specialist. Bola, how would you describe yourself?
translation.zh:
‎这位是博拉 我们的健康专家
‎博拉 你都有什么职责？

translation.en: Uh, well, due to safety, we don't have a lot of staff, so I get to do everything.
translation.zh:
‎安全起见 我们的员工不多
‎所以所有事都由我来做

translation.en: Which means if you need a personal trainer, Bola.
translation.zh:
‎也就是说 如果你需要私人教练的话
‎就找博拉

translation.en: If you need a yoga teacher, Bola.
translation.zh: ‎如果你需要瑜伽老师 就找博拉

translation.en: If you need a ping-pong opponent, Bola. If you need a masseuse?
translation.zh:
‎如果你需要找人打乒乓球 就找博拉
‎如果你需要按摩师？

translation.en: -[Carol] Bola! -[Bola] That's it, baby girl.
[man] We allowed to smoke weed in the room? I forgot to bring my edibles.
translation.zh:
‎房间里能抽大麻吗？
‎我忘带可食用的了

translation.en: [Carol] Oh, my God! Howie, how are you?
-[Howie] Carol, come here, my love! -[man 1] Stop! That's it. Stop it!
translation.zh:
‎-卡罗尔 快过来 我的宝贝！
‎-停下！好了 停下！

translation.en: -[man 2] Off you go. -[Howie] What the fuck is going on?
-Brother, help me! -[Carol] Howie?
Give it two weeks, and you'll have all the hugs you need.
translation.zh: ‎两周以后 你想抱谁都可以

translation.en: [Bola] Reception area.
[Carol sighs] Now, this is beautiful.
[Bola] Of course! Top of the line for top-of-the-line talent.
translation.zh:
‎当然了！
‎顶尖人才就该得到顶尖的待遇

translation.en: [Bola] There you are.
[Carol gasps] This is nice!
[Bola] Good. See you in two weeks.
She loves you! And you're the prime minister!
Am I your bitch now?
That's what you get for fucking with her mission!
translation.zh: ‎这就是你破坏她任务的下场！

translation.en: [groans] This is too much for anyone to take!
translation.zh: ‎这种痛苦任何人都承受不了！

translation.en: Hey, Carol Cobb.
Your quarantine is over. [chuckles]
Uh, the cocktail party starts in one hour, okay?
translation.zh: ‎鸡尾酒派对一个小时后开始 好吗？

translation.en: Please shower before you come.
It stinks in here.
-Jesus Christ. -[door closes]
-This is so exciting. -[man] Hmm.
It's like my movie posters have come to life.
Yeah, you will soon learn to hate these people.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你很快就会讨厌这些人

translation.en: You abandoned us.
I am mad at you. Back away.
I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
-Are you? -[Carol] I am.
I should have done the movie. I shouldn't have bailed.
translation.zh: ‎我应该拍那部电影的 我不该退出

translation.en: I'm an idiot.
I missed you so much. I did.
-You did? -Yeah.
Sorry. Had to get that off my chest.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我必须发泄出那口气

translation.en: Yeah, give it to me. [chuckles]
And I really liked you in Jerusalem Rising.
translation.zh:
‎我真的很喜欢
‎你在《耶路撒冷崛起》中的表现

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -Really?
That means so much coming from you.
translation.zh:
‎-没错
‎-你的肯定对我来说意义重大

translation.en: And I think that all of the critics around the world are wrong.
translation.zh: ‎我认为世界各地的影评家都瞎了眼

translation.en: Oh, not everyone.
Four percent on Rotten Tomatoes. [scoffs]
It doesn't really go lower.
So I need cool, documentary-style footage.
translation.zh: ‎我需要冷静的纪录片风格影像

translation.en: If the actors ask for air, give them air, but then strike and get what we need.
translation.zh:
‎如果演员需要空间 给他们就是
‎然后突然出击 拍到我们想要的镜头

translation.en: I want you to be a fly on the wall,
translation.zh: ‎我希望拍摄时采用纪实风格

translation.en: but also up their arse.
-Now, fuck off, Lee. -My name is Scott, actually.
translation.zh:
‎-滚吧 李
‎-其实我叫斯科特

translation.en: -I don't care. -Okay.
You a big Cliff Beasts fan?
No, but I saw the trailer for the second one. It was so cool!
translation.zh:
‎不是 但我看了第二部的预告片
‎非常酷！

translation.en: -Oh. -[Scott] Hey!
Hi, y'all!
Excited for Cliff Beasts?
[whispers] Is this the movie?
[Scott hesitates] What?
Are we shooting right now?
No, it's just behind-the-scenes stuff.
translation.zh: ‎不 我就是拍点幕后花絮

translation.en: Just say, like, a sentence about why you're excited?
translation.zh: ‎你能表达一下自己激动的心情吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. You're gonna have to talk to my mom if you wanna talk to me.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 如果你想跟我说话
‎得先征得我妈妈的同意

translation.en: Oh, all right.
-It's nice meeting you. -Okay, you too.
translation.zh:
‎-很高兴见到你
‎-好 我也是

translation.en: -[woman] Dieter! Hi! -Hi.
Lauren. Um…
I just wanted to tell you how incredible you were in Hunger Strike.
translation.zh:
‎我就是想告诉你
‎你在《绝食抗议》里的表演很惊艳

translation.en: Your performance was…
I mean, I think about it all the time. Just fearless and a total triumph.
translation.zh:
‎我每时每刻都在想
‎你是那样毫无畏惧 堪称典范

translation.en: Um… Congratulations.
I don't watch my own shit. Never watch your own shit.
translation.zh:
‎我不看自己演的片子
‎永远别看自己拉出来的东西

translation.en: You just wipe, you flush, and you move on.
translation.zh: ‎擦完屁股 冲水 走人就好

translation.en: Right. Well, anyway, I just wanted to let you know that it really stuck with me,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 总之 我只是想让你知道
‎这片子在我脑海里挥之不去

translation.en: and it was very powerful. Just…
Yeah. Where's your husband?
My husband? We got divorced.
Of course.
[Dieter] I'm sorry.
No worries. It's… We're fine.
We are, uh… totally fine.
We have gone through a lot, and we are coming out on the other side.
translation.zh: ‎我们经历了很多 但也在慢慢走出来

translation.en: Right.
Our main priority is our 16-year-old son,
translation.zh: ‎我们一切都以16岁的儿子为重

translation.en: who we just adopted right before the divorce.
translation.zh: ‎我们在离婚前刚刚领养了他

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry, I'm trying to care, but it's hard.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我很抱歉
‎我很想关心你 但是太难了

translation.en: Gunther, I like you.
Really? I like you too. I think you're… Okay, 'cause…
translation.zh:
‎真的吗？我也喜欢你
‎我觉得你…好吧 因为…

translation.en: That feels amazing,
'cause we got told we weren't allowed to be friends with the cast.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们被告知
‎不允许和演员交朋友

translation.en: Who said that?
I don't wanna be a person that's like, "It was Gavin," but, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎我不想当告密者 “噢 是加文”
‎但是 没错

translation.en: Know how I feel about that?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我怎么想吗？
‎你去死吧 加文！

translation.en: -Fuck you, Gavin! -Do you?
Suck your mum, Gavin! Say it from your chest.
translation.zh: ‎去你妈的 加文！大声说出来吧

translation.en: What? [mumbles] Fuck you, Gavin!
I need to be real with you. I don't understand these bullshit rules.
translation.zh:
‎冈瑟 我要跟你说实话
‎我不理解这些狗屁规定

translation.en: Been in my room two weeks. I ain't had human contact.
translation.zh:
‎我在房间里待了两周
‎没有任何人际接触

translation.en: It's important for my mental and physical health to have human contact with friends.
translation.zh:
‎跟朋友进行人际接触
‎对我的身体和精神健康都十分重要

translation.en: -We're friends! -Completely.
-What will happen if I touch you? Huh? -We could die.
translation.zh:
‎-我就算碰一下你会怎样？
‎-我们可能会死

translation.en: Yeah, completely. It's kind of the situation.
translation.zh: ‎完全没错 情况就是这样

translation.en: -Yeah. -Boop!
-Um-- -Did we die? Are you dead?
You've just got to understand that my job, as a health officer,
translation.zh: ‎你必须理解我的工作 作为健康官员

translation.en: is to make sure that everything that we're doing is as safe as possible.
translation.zh:
‎我一定要确保我们所做的一切
‎都尽可能安全

translation.en: All the best, Gunther.
-Um, my dad does stunts. -Hi.
Um, I'm lonely, and I'm in hell here,
translation.zh: ‎我很孤单 我在这里生不如死

translation.en: and I would like to form an alliance with you.
[hesitates] Okay, yeah, sure.
All right, okay.
It was hard doing the last one without you.
translation.zh: ‎上一部没有你 我拍得太辛苦了

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I'm sorry. I got really bad advice from my reps
translation.zh:
‎我很抱歉 ‎我的代理人提供了糟糕的建议
‎而且我还需要处理一些感情问题

translation.en: and was also having some, ahem, emotional issues.
translation.zh:
‎我的代理人提供了糟糕的建议
‎而且我还需要处理一些感情问题

translation.en: That's where you were on your journey, and it brought you right back here.
translation.zh:
‎你的人生之旅进行到了那里
‎它把你带回了这里

translation.en: -[Carol] Exactly. -It's all good.
-I heard you were starting a religion. -No, it's a… [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: ‎我听说你创建了宗教 ‎不 就是…

translation.en: It's a lifestyle brand slash motivational system
translation.zh: ‎就是一种生活方式品牌和动机系统

translation.en: called Harmony Ignite.
Wow. And you wrote a whole Bible.
Well, I wrote a book. A book called Harmony Ignited.
translation.zh:
‎其实 我是写了一本书
‎一本叫《点燃和谐》的书

translation.en: And, uh, it's just a collection of my thoughts and musings
translation.zh: ‎就是一部关于我的想法、沉思

translation.en: and some sayings and wisdom and proverbs. That's it, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎一些语录、智慧和谚语的合集
‎对 就是这样

translation.en: It's not a religion, per se. You can leave anytime that you want to.
translation.zh:
‎本质上不是宗教信仰
‎随时想脱离都可以

translation.en: -It's not, like, a cult. -No, it's definitely not a cult.
translation.zh:
‎-对 不是邪教
‎-不 肯定不是邪教

translation.en: I mean, who defines what a cult is?
-Yeah. -Okay.
You know what? I'm gonna be really straightforward with you right now
translation.zh: ‎知道吗？我现在就对你有话直说了

translation.en: and let you know that we are co-parents to Raphael, and that is it.
translation.zh:
‎让你知道我们要共同养育拉斐尔
‎就这样

translation.en: That's true.
So what happened on parts one and three and four is not happening again.
translation.zh:
‎第一部、第三部、第四部拍摄期间
‎发生的事情 不会再发生了

translation.en: What about what we did on part two?
translation.zh: ‎那我们在第二部拍摄期间做的事呢？

translation.en: You have no respect for me.
I have nothing but respect for you.
Stop.
Stop.
-Stop it. -Stop.
I would appreciate if you didn't look at me like that.
-Where should I look? -I can't look at you.
-I'm still here though. -[sighs]
I know you.
-God. Hi. -[laughs]
-How are you doing? Sorry to scare you. -Don't worry. I am so excited that you are here.
translation.zh:
‎你好 很抱歉吓到你了
‎你能来真是让我太开心了

translation.en: Oh, yeah. No, I'm so excited.
Gotta tell you, I love the TikTok stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我得告诉你 我超爱你拍的抖音

translation.en: You are crushing it. Absolutely crushing it.
translation.zh: ‎你真是太厉害了 完全玩转这软件了

translation.en: I mean, clearly. 120 million followers. You are unbelievable.
translation.zh:
‎很明显嘛
‎一亿两千万粉丝 你太牛了！

translation.en: I love the one where you and your cat lip-synch to Harry Potter.
translation.zh:
‎我喜欢你和你的猫对口型
‎模仿《哈利波特》片段的那个视频

translation.en: I can't believe you've seen all that.
[laughs] It's fantastic! Hey, maybe you and I can do one together while we're here.
translation.zh:
‎太妙了！嘿 正好咱俩都在这里
‎或许可以一起合拍

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, maybe. -Yeah.
-What's your name? -Carla.
Nice to meet you. You got great energy about you.
translation.zh:
‎很高兴认识你 卡拉
‎你身上充满了活力

translation.en: Gavs!
Who is that?
One of the actors. He's not that good though.
translation.zh: ‎剧组的一个演员 不过他咖位不大

translation.en: -[piano music playing] -May I refresh your water?
Yeah, please.
Thanks.
Why you look at me with weird eyes? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎你为什么用这种奇怪的眼神看我？

translation.en: -Jesus fucking Christ. -Wow.
-[man] Hey! -[woman] Hey!
-[Gavin] Okay. -Hit us with it, Gav.
Welcome! I'm gonna introduce somebody now who is…
translation.zh: ‎欢迎大家！我要向大家介绍一位…

translation.en: He's special.
He's funny.
He's extremely intelligent.
And he's a…
He's a visionary.
He shot a brilliant movie called Tiles of Love while working at Home Depot.
translation.zh:
‎他在家得宝工作时拍摄了
‎一部叫《爱情瓷砖》的优秀电影

translation.en: -Our director… Darren Eigen! -[cheering]
-[whistling] Whoo! -Thank you! Thanks, you guys. Uh…
I just wanna say
I am so lucky to be able to work with a cast this talented.
translation.zh:
‎我很幸运能和一支如此才华横溢的
‎演员团队合作

translation.en: This is your car,
and I'm gonna step in and take the wheel.
translation.zh: ‎但我要上车 掌控方向盘了

translation.en: This drive is gonna be a little crazy.
Gonna head towards the railing a couple of times. Might hit it.
translation.zh:
‎会有几次冲向护栏
‎甚至可能会撞上去

translation.en: Some of you might not even survive.
But I've got the end of the road in my sight.
translation.zh: ‎但我已经看到了这条路的终点

translation.en: Might be a crazy ride,
but it's gonna look great,
and it's gonna make the world forget all their problems.
translation.zh: ‎它会让全世界的人忘记所有烦恼

translation.en: So, let's go for a ride.
We're fucked.
Are you sure it's safe?
Just don't put your hands too close to your face.
-[squawking] -[nervously] Oh, shit. Aah!
No! No! No!
-[Darren] Grab. Nice. Right arm. Block. -[grunting]
translation.zh: ‎抓住 很好 右胳膊 锁住 很好

translation.en: Move around. Good. Let me hear the rage. Aah. Spins around, kick. Great.
translation.zh:
‎移动 很好 让我听到愤怒
‎转过来 踢 非常好

translation.en: [trainer] Get him, boy. Get him!
Heart shot! Yeah!
Dick shot!
[trainer] Over.
[Howie] Oi! And roll.
[trainer] Rusty, come! Come on, boy!
translation.zh: ‎拉斯蒂 过来！拉斯蒂 快啊 狗狗！

translation.en: Can you train him to peck off Dustin's balls?
translation.zh: ‎你能训练它啄掉达斯汀的蛋蛋吗？

translation.en: I'm just kidding.
But can you? [laughing]
Gavin, how are you?
Hi! [chuckles] How are you doing?
Oh, good. I just wanted to say, uh, good luck,
and we love you, and we're counting on you.
translation.zh: ‎我们很爱你 我们就靠你了

translation.en: I know. I'm on it.
You are such a hero for keeping the lights on at the studio.
translation.zh: ‎你维持着公司的运转 真是太伟大了

translation.en: This lockdown has been so hard on all of us.
translation.zh: ‎这次封锁让我们所有人日子都不好过

translation.en: But you're skiing?
Yeah, well, this was the only country that was open. Thank God I got my shot.
translation.zh:
‎对 只有这个国家还对外开放
‎谢天谢地我打疫苗了

translation.en: [chuckles] Did you? I thought they weren't available for six months.
translation.zh: ‎是吗？我还以为六个月后才能打

translation.en: Oh, they're not. Not for normal people, but I'm with rich people.
translation.zh:
‎不是的 普通人要等六个月
‎但我和富人是一伙的

translation.en: Don't hate the player, hate the game. Ugh! I hate the game.
translation.zh:
‎别怪我 要怪就怪体制
‎我对体制恨之入骨

translation.en: Anyway, have a great shoot.
I love you. I'm in love with you.
And do not fuck me!
So the thing about Harmony Ignite is it's about dreams.
translation.zh: ‎和谐点燃的宗旨是关于梦想的

translation.en: It's about how you go about fulfilling your dreams.
I'm not really looking for a new religion.
I'm Hindu. Many gods, very busy.
translation.zh: ‎我信印度教 我的神太多了 很忙的

translation.en: -I have a question for you, man. -Mm-hmm.
-What's your dream? -My dream?
Your dream. I wanna hear it.
This won't be the last pandemic. We all know that.
translation.zh: ‎这不会是最后一次疫情 我们都知道

translation.en: -Absolutely. -We still need to have sex.
My brother, a software engineer in India, has invented a glove.
translation.zh:
‎我的哥哥 一位印度的软件工程师
‎他研发出了一款手套

translation.en: It's like a hand that you can wrap around you
translation.zh: ‎就像一只手 它能裹住你的鸡鸡

translation.en: or put inside you, anally.
Then somewhere, in a different city, somebody else has the hand,
translation.zh:
‎在其他城市的某个地方
‎另一个人也有一只这样的手

translation.en: and then they do things to the hand that you feel on you or inside you.
translation.zh:
‎他们能够操控裹住你的鸡鸡
‎或插进你菊花里的那只手

translation.en: You're safe. It's sanitary ecstasy. You'll be wearing virtual reality goggles,
translation.zh:
‎但你很安全！这超级卫生
‎你会戴上虚拟现实眼镜

translation.en: so you can have sex anywhere in the world with anyone.
translation.zh: ‎这样就能和世界上任何人发生性关系

translation.en: Well, thank you for coming to pick up my tray. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你来收我的餐具 很感谢

translation.en: Oh, no. Sure, yeah. Uh…
This was… If you get lonely…
Anika.
Hi.
I was wondering if you could help.
translation.zh: ‎我想问问你能不能帮我个忙

translation.en: With what?
You wanna have sex with me?
Yes, I do!
-[thumps desk] -Amazing.
Not now.
When?
When I get to know you, because I like you.
translation.zh: ‎等我了解你之后 因为我喜欢你

translation.en: -Great. -Then I would like you to meet my father.
translation.zh:
‎-很好
‎-然后我想让你见见我父亲

translation.en: And if you get his permission, you will sign a lifelong agreement
translation.zh:
‎如果你得到他的允许
‎就会签下终生约定

translation.en: because I am a pure angel,
and you won't come across someone like me again.
translation.zh: ‎你不会再遇到我这样的人了

translation.en: [Gunther] Okay, hi, guys!
Yeah, let's talk about zones for a moment. Uh, there are three main ones, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我们先来说一下各个区域
‎这里主要有三个区域 好吗？

translation.en: There's Red Zone. That's the best zone. That's the actors, okay?
translation.zh:
‎有红色区域 是最好的区域
‎是给演员用的 好吗？

translation.en: Then there's Blue Zone. That's for crew.
translation.zh: ‎蓝色区域 是给剧组用的

translation.en: Then there's Yellow Zone for office staff. We don't need to worry about that.
translation.zh:
‎还有给内勤的黄色区域
‎那个不用我们管

translation.en: Um, a lot of you have been asking about flirting.
translation.zh: ‎你们很多人都在问关于调情的事情

translation.en: Yes, it happens. Um, physical touch is, of course, off the table.
translation.zh:
‎对 这种事在所难免
‎当然 身体接触绝对不行

translation.en: Um, so what I would recommend is making sweet eyes at each other.
translation.zh: ‎所以我推荐你们彼此眉目传情

translation.en: Um, if you're wondering what that looks like, that'd be…
translation.zh: ‎如果你们想知道是怎样的 就是这样

translation.en: Are there any questions?
Amazing! Let's have some fun.
[man 1] So, uh, Gio, this is your first expedition up Mount Everest?
translation.zh:
‎吉奥 这是你第一次
‎攀登珠穆朗玛峰吗？

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] Yes, but, uh, it is not news to me
that Modelcorp is lucky to have hired all of you
translation.zh: ‎莫德集团有幸雇佣了你们大家

translation.en: to make sure all the creatures of this land are respected
translation.zh:
‎确保这片土地上的所有生物
‎都得到尊重

translation.en: and honored.
[man 2] It's not a creature.
What we hear from the locals, we may be dealing with a cliff beast.
translation.zh:
‎根据当地人的说法
‎我们可能要面对悬崖野兽

translation.en: Climate change has melted the whole top of the mountain.
It's a burnt wasteland.
The beast must have come out of the melted permafrost.
translation.zh:
‎野兽一定是从
‎融化的永久冻土里出来的

translation.en: Global warming, my ass! Who did this?
translation.zh: ‎狗屁全球变暖！这是谁办的好事？

translation.en: Uh, man.
And wo-man.
One thing I've learned growing up in the mossy savannas of Alabama
translation.zh:
‎我在阿拉巴马州苔藓稀树草原的
‎成长过程中学到一件事

translation.en: is if you've seen one June bug,
there's more than likely 500 more waiting in the wings.
-We've seen this before. -Five times is what I have heard.
translation.zh:
‎-我们以前见过这玩意
‎-我听说你们见过五次

translation.en: Why are we going towards the dinosaurs? That's where the danger is!
translation.zh:
‎我们为什么要朝着恐龙的方向前进？
‎那里是危险所在！

translation.en: Oh, no. That sounds like a baby crying for its mama.
translation.zh: ‎不 听起来像是宝宝在呼唤妈妈

translation.en: That ain't no baby!
My God, what are we gonna do?
Somebody help him!
[man 1] Drop him!
Hang in there!
How does he fly? He has no feathers!
translation.zh: ‎它是怎么飞起来的？它没有羽毛！

translation.en: Well, somebody taught him how to fly!
[man 2] Please stop!
It's okay. I got him!
[Darren] All right, cut!
-Great work. -[bell ringing]
-That was a great take. -Moving on.
-Oh, um, Sean? -Yeah?
Did you have a chance to read the screenplay I sent you?
translation.zh: ‎你看过我寄给你的剧本了吗？

translation.en: Oh. They're bringing me down. I'm sorry, buddy.
translation.zh: ‎他们要放我下去了 抱歉 伙计

translation.en: -Oh, I can still hear you. -[Sean] One second. Getting unplugged.
translation.zh:
‎-我还是能听到你说话
‎-等等 我要解开绳子

translation.en: Darren, one note before we move on?
translation.zh:
‎达伦 拍下一条前
‎给你提个建议好吗？

translation.en: I don't get when Dolly says, "Somebody taught him how to fly."
translation.zh:
‎我不理解多莉说“有人教它飞的”
‎是什么意思

translation.en: They're cliff beasts. It's in their DNA. That's what they do. They fly.
translation.zh:
‎它们是悬崖野兽 这是它们的本性
‎它们天性如此 它们会飞

translation.en: You can't rewrite my lines. You're not the writer.
translation.zh: ‎你不能重改我的台词 你不是编剧

translation.en: But it goes against dinosaur logic.
Why are you rewriting the script? We have a writer. Aren't you an actor?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么要重写剧本？
‎我们有编剧 你不是演员吗？

translation.en: Yes, but I'm also the guardian of the franchise.
translation.zh: ‎对 但我也是系列电影的守护者

translation.en: -So I'm rewriting it. -We have somebody.
translation.zh:
‎-所以我才重写
‎-我们有专业人士

translation.en: Can we play to the top of our audience's intelligence?
translation.zh: ‎我们不要低估观众的智商 好吗？

translation.en: No, our audience is down here. They're kids. That's our audience.
translation.zh:
‎不 我们的观众智商不高
‎就是孩子而已 他们是我们的观众

translation.en: Don't listen to him. He doesn't want me to have the big crowd-applause line.
translation.zh:
‎别听他的 ‎他就是不想让我说
‎让观众拍手叫绝的台词

translation.en: Lauren, all of your lines will be big applause lines
translation.zh:
‎劳伦 你所有台词
‎都会让观众拍手叫绝

translation.en: if movie theaters ever open again.
Carol hates the writing too.
What? Carol?
Lauren, that was private!
translation.zh: ‎劳伦 这是我们之间的私事！

translation.en: Plus, I also didn't say it.
That is exactly why I asked them not to bring you back after you bailed.
translation.zh:
‎所以我才叫他们别在你退出后
‎把你找回来

translation.en: -I didn't bail. Am I getting coffee? -[man] Mm-hmm.
-He doesn't know what he's doing. -What are you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-他自己心里压根就没数
‎-你在做什么？

translation.en: Covering your mic so people can't hear us.
translation.zh:
‎捂住你的麦克风
‎大家就听不到我们讲话了

translation.en: I know. I do feel like my dialogue is a little lackluster.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 我确实觉得
‎自己的对话有点平淡

translation.en: So let me fix it. Let me punch it up.
-Can you do that? -I can punch it up.
Let me take care of you.
How are you gonna take care of me?
Well, I'm gonna start dialogue-wise,
and then, you know, move on from there, I guess?
-You're gonna… punch me up? -Oh, yeah.
Guys, if you make any changes to the script, can you just cc me on it?
translation.zh:
‎两位 如果你们对剧本有什么改动
‎能抄送我一份吗？

translation.en: At least?
[softly] "Guardian of the franchise"? Assholes. I won Sundance!
translation.zh:
‎“系列电影的守护者”？
‎一群混蛋 我可是拿过圣丹斯奖！

translation.en: -What's the point of us being up here? -Eyelines. So they know where to look.
translation.zh:
‎-把我们吊在这里有什么意义？
‎-基线 这样他们就知道看哪了

translation.en: Pretty cool.
♪ Why do birds suddenly appear ♪
♪ Every time you are near? ♪
♪ Just like me ♪
♪ They long to be ♪
♪ Close to you… ♪
And you and you.
-What's this? [laughs] -What's the next bit?
Hey, guys. Just listen up for a second.
We have had a situation on set
that means we're going to shut down production
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 我们要停止拍摄

translation.en: and go back into quarantine.
That's not even funny.
Screw you, Gavin. That's hilarious, man.
translation.zh: ‎去你的吧 加文 真好笑

translation.en: I wish I was joking, but I'm not. You all have to go back to your rooms.
translation.zh:
‎我也希望自己是在开玩笑 但不是的
‎你们必须返回自己的房间

translation.en: No!
We had a positive test on set,
and although I am forbidden from telling you who it was,
translation.zh: ‎虽然我被禁止告诉你们这人是谁

translation.en: let's just say it's the girl who gets your coffees.
translation.zh: ‎但其实是早上给你们取咖啡的女孩

translation.en: Um, her name's Wendy.
That creepy PA?
Yeah, production were trying to be safe by sending one person to get the coffees,
translation.zh:
‎对 制片本来是为了安全
‎才让一个人去取所有咖啡

translation.en: when in fact that led to Wendy touching about 80 coffee cups this morning.
translation.zh:
‎但这实际上导致了
‎温迪今早接触了大约80杯咖啡

translation.en: We're gonna die.
-No, we're not gonna die! Howie. -[actors clamoring]
Is this how it always goes?
No, this is a shit show.
-Guys, calm down! -Oi!
[emotionally] I am a mother, so I have to go!
translation.zh: ‎我是个母亲 所以我必须走！

translation.en: Or I need a larger room.
If I could just switch rooms with Howie,
translation.zh: ‎如果我可以和豪伊换房间的话

translation.en: because he has the tub, and I have only a shower!
translation.zh: ‎因为他房间有浴缸 我只有淋浴头！

translation.en: [Howie] Yeah, but in Pakistan, you ain't shit!
translation.zh: ‎但是在巴基斯坦 你屁都不算！

translation.en: Okay, guys, listen, okay? I have had the virus three times, okay?
translation.zh:
‎好了 各位 听着 好吗？
‎我感染过三次病毒 好吗？

translation.en: And the first time, I didn't even notice it.
Second time, was in a coma.
The third time, I lost my sense of sort of taste and smell
translation.zh: ‎第三次 我失去了味觉和嗅觉

translation.en: and how I felt about people.
Trust me, that is something that you want to avoid.
translation.zh: ‎相信我 这是你们想避免的东西

translation.en: I think he's still sick.
I can't wear rings anymore
translation.zh: ‎而且 我也不能戴戒指了

translation.en: because my fingers change size every single day.
I can't do this, man. I can't stay in my room any longer on my own.
translation.zh:
‎我做不到
‎我不能再自己一个人待在房间了

translation.en: If you make me, I'll fuck my chair!
translation.zh: ‎如果你们逼我 我就上我的椅子！

translation.en: No. Look, guys, we're here for you.
translation.zh: ‎不 大家听着 有我们在

translation.en: So don't worry. Once you're all back in your rooms,
translation.zh: ‎所以不用担心 一旦你们都回到房间

translation.en: we're gonna take great care of you.
You have to go into your room too.
-Why? -You had a latte.
-Oh, fuck! -I know.
So how are you feeling about the new quarantine?
translation.zh: ‎你对新一轮隔离有什么看法？

translation.en: -[people clamoring] -Really? Really?
-Sorry, when would be a good time-- -Never.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 什么时候合适…
‎-永远都不会

translation.en: -Fuck off! -Perfect.
It's ten seconds and we're done. Are you ready?
translation.zh: ‎十秒钟就好 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, let's go. Let's go.
Fuck you! Fuck you, you fucking bastard!
I'm gonna kill you, and then I'm gonna murder your ghost!
translation.zh: ‎我要宰了你 我要把你的魂都灭了！

translation.en: That was not too bad.
You okay?
-I'm sorry. -I'll wait.
-That's a little too deep. -[Gunther] It's better that way. I think…
translation.zh:
‎-有点太深了
‎-最好这样 我觉得…

translation.en: -Are you… Excuse me, are you all right? -[Gunther] Yes. Yeah, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你没…不好意思 你没事吧？
‎-没事

translation.en: Fuck you! You're not gonna win! I am gonna win, you motherfucker!
translation.zh:
‎该死！你不会赢的！
‎我会赢 你这王八蛋！

translation.en: "How many species have died because of man? Thousands!"
translation.zh:
‎有多少物种因为人类灭亡？
‎成千上万种！

translation.en: "I think it's snack time. For them."
translation.zh: ‎“现在应该是零食时间 对它们而言”

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] "These cliff beasts are so large! How do they fly?"
translation.zh: ‎这些悬崖野兽好大！ ‎它们是怎么飞起来的？

translation.en: "How? How?"
"How do they fly?"
"There's nothing left to eat but us."
translation.zh: ‎“没有吃的了 只剩下我们！”

translation.en: "These cliff beasts are so large!"
Sound idea for a cliff beast. Here's beast one.
translation.zh: ‎悬崖野兽的声音创意 这是一号野兽

translation.en: Swooping down.
Mating.
Mourning the loss of a child.
Full rage.
Mother, I can't do 13 more days of this!
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 我受不了再隔离13天了！

translation.en: I've already been doing this for 12 hours. It's too much!
translation.zh: ‎我已经隔离12个小时了 我受够了！

translation.en: Hey, guys, it's Krystal.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大家好 我是克丽丝托

translation.en: Um, I'm back in quarantine in my room.
translation.zh: ‎我又回到自己的房间隔离了

translation.en: I'm gonna need a lot of movie suggestions,
but I wanna watch more, like, dark stuff.
Everyone told me to watch this movie, E.T.? Felt a little racist.
translation.zh:
‎大家都说让我看《E.T.外星人》？
‎我感觉那片子有点种族歧视

translation.en: I don't wanna watch anything that'd offend my fans.
translation.zh: ‎我不想看冒犯到粉丝的电影

translation.en: I have respect for everybody that follows me.
Sean, you are not in competition with Krystal.
translation.zh: ‎肖恩 你不是在跟克丽丝托竞赛

translation.en: You are not aging. You don't need 100 million followers.
translation.zh: ‎你没有变老 你不需要一亿粉丝

translation.en: I am titanium!
I am invincible! Age is an illusion!
translation.zh: ‎我是不可战胜的！年龄只是幻觉！

translation.en: Time cannot catch me! Never die!
translation.zh: ‎时间追不上我！我永远不会死！

translation.en: [Howie] I need weed immediately! Buy a drone.
translation.zh: ‎我现在就需要大麻！买个无人机

translation.en: Attach my marijuana to the drone. Fly that shit through my fucking window!
translation.zh:
‎把我的大麻绑到无人机上
‎然后让那玩意飞进我的窗户！

translation.en: "I just want a safe place for the dinosaurs to live!"
translation.zh:
‎我只是想给恐龙
‎一个安全的生存空间！

translation.en: I really couldn't do this without you.
I probably could do it without you, but that's just because I'm used to it.
translation.zh:
‎可能没有你我也能待下去
‎但那只是因为我习惯了

translation.en: This is the first time I've left Indiana.
translation.zh: ‎这是我第一次离开印第安纳

translation.en: So did you, like, audition for the movie or what?
translation.zh: ‎你是参加了这部电影的试镜吗？

translation.en: I think they just jammed me in this movie because I have a lot of followers.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得是他们硬把我塞进电影里
‎因为我有很多粉丝

translation.en: Must be fun having 100 million followers.
Sometimes I just want a break,
but my mom just tells me if I don't keep putting out content,
translation.zh:
‎但我妈妈告诉我
‎如果我不持续输出内容

translation.en: then everybody's just gonna forget about me, so…
I can help you if you want.
translation.zh: ‎如果你想的话 我可以帮你

translation.en: You know, I've never had a normal friend.
No one's ever called me normal before.
Why are you laughing?
You're such a freak.
[Sean] Whoo! I'm doing it, son!
This is awesome!
Gavin, buddy, can you hear me?
translation.zh: ‎加文 兄弟 你能听到我说话吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
This is all I'm doing? I'm just going up?
translation.zh:
‎我只能这样做吗？
‎只能这样往上飞吗？

translation.en: You're only allowed to learn how to go up.
That's all we need for the shot in the movie.
translation.zh: ‎我们的电影只需要上升镜头

translation.en: [Sean] If I can go forward just even a little bit,
my fans, they will shit their dicks.
translation.zh: ‎我的粉丝们肯定会激动得尿裤子

translation.en: Gavin, is this safe? Why is he doing this?
translation.zh:
‎加文 这样安全吗？
‎他为什么要这样？

translation.en: He wouldn't do the movie unless we let him do this.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们不让他开飞机
‎他就不拍电影

translation.en: How exciting is it to direct a movie with a $100 million budget?
translation.zh:
‎导演一部预算一亿美元的电影
‎有多激动人心呢？

translation.en: It's a lot of pressure.
Well, it would be a lot of pressure if the cast wasn't so brilliant.
translation.zh:
‎如果演员不怎么出色
‎当然会压力山大

translation.en: See you later, buddy.
Are you worried people won't watch a movie about dinosaurs,
given the serious nature of the global pandemic?
translation.zh:
‎你会担心人们不想看
‎恐龙题材的电影吗？

translation.en: Hey, are you being a fly on the wall?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你在进行纪实拍摄吗？

translation.en: You're a pretty noisy fucking fly! I can hardly hear the helicopter!
translation.zh:
‎你是一只很吵的苍蝇！
‎我都听不到直升机的声音了！

translation.en: Sorry, just doing my job.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我只是在尽到工作义务

translation.en: What job is that? Trying to get in my fucking head?
translation.zh: ‎这算什么工作 跟我斗智吗？

translation.en: Like he wants me to fail!
Don't let him mess with your focus. Everybody wants you to fail.
translation.zh:
‎别让他打乱你的注意力
‎大家都想看你失败

translation.en: Don't give a fuck about him.
What?
-Where's Ronjon? -You asked for a tray table to be removed.
translation.zh:
‎-荣乔呢？
‎-你说需要人撤走餐桌

translation.en: I said send Ronjon.
You wanted sex, but you will get love.
translation.zh: ‎你想要性 但你会得到爱

translation.en: Hold on.
Isn't that nice?
You don't know me!
Am I a great director?
Yes, of course you are.
You have a vision.
-Yeah, I think I do. -Yeah.
So what do I do when Dustin keeps trying to rewrite the script?
translation.zh:
‎达斯汀一直想要重写剧本
‎我该怎么做？

translation.en: When he tells you his ideas, tell him you'll think about them,
translation.zh:
‎如果他跟你说了自己的想法
‎告诉他 你会仔细考虑

translation.en: and then never get back to him.
You do that to me.
No, with you, I'm actually thinking.
translation.zh: ‎不 我真的思考了你的建议

translation.en: I'm just playing around.
Making movies is fun!
That's why we do it!
I'm sorry I skipped your mom's funeral to go to the People's Choice Awards.
translation.zh:
‎我为了参加人民选择奖颁奖典礼
‎没能出席你妈妈的葬礼 真的很抱歉

translation.en: I'm sorry that I
burned down your back office.
I'm sorry I slept with your agent.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉我和你的经纪人睡了

translation.en: -Sorry that-- -And your manager.
And your divorce lawyer.
-Yeah. -Uh…
I'm sorry I gave up on us.
[sighs] Why is it always so hard?
[sighs] I think 'cause you're so strong. You're so intimidating. So talented.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得是因为你太强势
‎你让人心生畏惧 你太有才华了

translation.en: I feel like nobody would be able to fix the script the way you do
translation.zh: ‎我觉得没人能像你那样修改剧本

translation.en: and stay in such incredible shape.
And you
are an amazing mother.
-Take me to the peak! -We are on a mountain!
-Ooh. I think I see one of the crew. -Oh, shit. Get…
translation.zh:
‎-我好像看到剧组的人了
‎-该死 赶紧…

translation.en: Uh, so how is the major motion picture going?
It's fine. Everybody's just old.
translation.zh: ‎还行吧 大家都上年纪了

translation.en: Is there somebody cute there?
-[chuckling] -Who you maybe wanna smooch with?
Don't be gross, Mom! God!
Is Timmy-thee Oilyphant there? Oh.
-No! -I could…
Why are you saying it like that? That's not his name!
translation.zh:
‎你为什么要这样说？
‎他名字不是这样的！

translation.en: But I wish he was here. I do. He's very cute.
translation.zh: ‎但我好希望他在 真的 他太帅了

translation.en: Oh. Are you nervous to meet the dinosaurs during your act?
translation.zh: ‎拍摄的时候 你见到恐龙会紧张吗？

translation.en: Mom, they're not real!
They, like… They put them in after.
I thought there was an elephant wearing a mask or something.
translation.zh: ‎我还以为会有戴着面具的大象什么的

translation.en: I wish you were here. I'm so lonely.
translation.zh: ‎真希望你在这里 我好孤单

translation.en: Come on! [huffs]
-Oh! Jesus! [grunts] -You okay?
-I'm fine! -Let me check.
-Hey, whoa, social distancing. -Sorry.
Why are you kicking balls around?
Uh, I'm with my squad. We're just bubbling before the big game.
translation.zh:
‎我和队员们一起
‎我们在此进行赛前隔离

translation.en: -A game? What kind of a game? -Football.
Soccer. I play for Betis.
translation.zh: ‎英式足球 我为贝蒂斯球队效力

translation.en: Oh. I didn't realize anybody else was in this hotel.
translation.zh: ‎我都不知道酒店里还有其他人

translation.en: Well, we are.
Well, I'm bubbling too. I'm an actress, and we're making a movie.
translation.zh:
‎我也在隔离 我是个演员
‎我们在拍电影

translation.en: I know you.
Cliff Beasts.
Dr. Lacie.
Yes, that's me, Dr. Lacie.
You're in Jerusalem Rising too, right?
translation.zh: ‎你也演过《耶路撒冷崛起》 对吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -I have to ask.
Are you half-Palestinian, half-Israeli?
translation.zh: ‎你是巴勒斯坦和以色列混血吗？

translation.en: Actually, I'm not either.
translation.zh: ‎其实 我这两种血统都没有

translation.en: Great acting.
Ah! That's so good to hear. So many people got mad at me.
translation.zh:
‎听到这句话我太开心了
‎因为好多人生我的气

translation.en: Everyone was offended. I was like, "I'm just trying to create a piece of art
translation.zh:
‎大家都感到被冒犯了
‎但我只想说：“我只是想创造一个

translation.en: that might help solve the issues."
translation.zh: ‎或许能帮助解决问题的艺术形象”

translation.en: Peace.
Well, Lacie, would you like to, uh, go to my room right now and just talk for a bit?
translation.zh:
‎蕾西 你现在想去我房间
‎跟我交流一下吗？

translation.en: -I'd like to talk. -Yeah, me too.
I feel like I haven't talked in a very long time.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉好长时间没跟人交流过了

translation.en: I'm a lot of fun to talk to.
I've just been talking to myself lately.
If I don't talk to you, I think I'm going to explode.
translation.zh: ‎如果不跟你交流 我觉得自己会爆炸

translation.en: But I don't think we're allowed to cross bubbles.
No, we wouldn't be crossing bubbles.
We'd be making a new bubble.
Then we're just inside each other's bubbles.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们会进入彼此的泡泡

translation.en: No. No, no, no. No, we can't. Stop it. Stop it.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我们不可以 打住吧

translation.en: Goodbye, Dr. Lacie.
-[Bola] Hello, friends. Good morning. -[exhales]
translation.zh: ‎你们好 朋友们 早上好

translation.en: Thank you all for joining our morning meditation.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢大家都来参加我们的晨间冥想

translation.en: This is our opportunity to breathe, let go of our troubles, and recharge.
translation.zh:
‎这是我们呼吸 抛却烦恼
‎重新充电的机会

translation.en: Yeah.
[Bola] I want you to close your eyes.
-Let the air fill your lungs… -[inhales]
…and release the fear of catching the virus.
And release the fear of the movie industry collapsing,
translation.zh: ‎释放对电影行业崩溃的恐惧

translation.en: leaving all of you penniless.
translation.zh: ‎释放对自己身无分文的恐惧

translation.en: Why you saying that?
Breathe in, and breathe out that fear
translation.zh: ‎吸气 然后呼出那种恐惧

translation.en: that the world is soon going to realize
translation.zh: ‎那种全世界很快就会意识到

translation.en: you people are not that special.
One might say useless.
-Excuse me, Bola. -[Bola] Yeah?
I can't take this. I can't take this shit no more, please.
translation.zh:
‎我受不了了 伙计
‎我真是受够了这种生活

translation.en: Don't judge your thoughts. Observe them!
translation.zh:
‎-别评判你的想法 要观察它们！
‎-我做不到

translation.en: I can't observe them. This is more than I can take. Yeah, I'm in pain.
translation.zh:
‎我没办法观察它们
‎我再也承受不住了 对 我很痛苦

translation.en: And I'm bored. Bored as fuck in this hotel!
translation.zh: ‎我很无聊 我在这酒店无聊死了！

translation.en: I need out of the hotel right now!
Howie, let me tell you about Harmony Ignite.
translation.zh: ‎豪伊 我跟你介绍一下和谐点燃吧

translation.en: Sean, do us a favor?
-Yeah. -Harmony Ignite your asshole!
-Howie! -Howie, easy!
You can't leave. You're the comic relief of the movie.
translation.zh:
‎你不能离开
‎你是这部片子的喜剧担当

translation.en: Fuck you, you fucker! How's that for witty comic relief? Huh?
translation.zh:
‎去你的吧 混蛋！
‎机智的喜剧担当这样说可以吗？

translation.en: [Sean] Howie.
I don't even know why you're complaining. It's not that bad being here.
translation.zh:
‎我都不知道你为什么要抱怨
‎待在这里没那么糟糕啊

translation.en: Why you talking to me? Your dances pave the way to the hellfire.
translation.zh:
‎你为什么对我说话？
‎你的舞蹈为通向地狱之火铺平了道路

translation.en: -[Dustin] Howie. -[Carol] Oh, my God.
Emotions are like a wave. You just gotta ride 'em.
translation.zh: ‎情绪就像波浪 你必须驾驭它们

translation.en: -Like a wave? -Let it pass.
-Let me show you a wave. -Oh, my God! Howie!
translation.zh:
‎-我给你看看什么是波浪
‎-天啊！豪伊！

translation.en: -Howie! -[Darren] Let go.
Are you riding the wave? How's this wave for you?
translation.zh: ‎你在乘风破浪吗？这波感觉如何？

translation.en: -Howie, you're hurting him. -I've got his dick in my hand! His lulli!
translation.zh:
‎-豪伊 你伤到他了
‎-我手里握着他的老二！他的根！

translation.en: Let go of his lulli.
Howie, release! Release!
I'll rip his lulli off if you keep pushing me!
translation.zh:
‎如果你们继续逼我
‎我就把他的根扯下来！

translation.en: Don't push me! That's enough. I'm gone from here.
translation.zh: ‎别逼我了！够了 我要离开这里

translation.en: Sick of this place! What kind of devilish business going on in here?
translation.zh:
‎我受够这地方了！
‎这都是些什么鬼事情？

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey! What's going on here?
I'll tell you what. I'm leaving!
translation.zh: ‎我告诉你怎么回事 我要走了！

translation.en: Howie, you are not leaving. We are in the middle of shooting!
translation.zh: ‎豪伊 你不能走 我们正在拍摄！

translation.en: I don't give a shit. You can replace me.
translation.zh: ‎我不在乎 好吗？你可以代替我

translation.en: That's not true! No one can play Jarrar but you.
translation.zh: ‎不是的！只有你能扮演加拉尔

translation.en: You're irreplaceable!
Anybody could play Jarrar! Should I tell you why? Batman!
translation.zh:
‎人人都能扮演加拉尔！
‎我要告诉你为什么吗？蝙蝠侠！

translation.en: -Batman? -He was Michael Keaton, yeah?
translation.zh:
‎-蝙蝠侠？
‎-一开始是迈克尔基顿 对吗？

translation.en: Then he was Val Kilmer.
Then George Clooney, but he brought too much sex to the role!
translation.zh:
‎然后是乔治克鲁尼
‎但他给这个角色带来了太多性意味！

translation.en: They got rid of him, brought in Ben Affleck, Christian Bale,
translation.zh:
‎所以他们弃用他 改用本阿弗莱克
‎克里斯蒂安贝尔

translation.en: now he's that skinny bastard from Twilight.
translation.zh:
‎现在成了《暮光之城》里
‎那个瘦了吧唧的混蛋

translation.en: Not within the same movie!
Zip! Gavin, everybody is replaceable.
translation.zh: ‎闭嘴！加文 所有人都是可替代的

translation.en: This is a very judgmental business. You leave, you'll be blackballed.
translation.zh:
‎这个行业的人都是小心眼
‎如果你离开 就会被拉黑

translation.en: Thank you for your concern, but I am gone!
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你对我的关心 但我还是要走！

translation.en: And you can fuck off!
[actors] Howie!
Howie, your weed turned up this morning!
translation.zh: ‎豪伊 你的大麻今天早上到了！

translation.en: -Howie! -Howie, where are you going?
-I'm going to London! -Send help!
-[Lauren] We need you! -[Sean] What are you doing?
-Howie! Come on! -[Carol] Howie!
-[Bola] That was pretty good. -[Carol] He's okay.
Howie Frangopolous! Come back!
translation.zh: ‎豪伊弗朗戈波卢斯！给我回来！

translation.en: [Howie] ♪ Finally, escaped to freedom! ♪
That is not London. He is going the wrong way.
translation.zh: ‎那边不是伦敦的方向 他走错路了

translation.en: Goodbye, Howie!
Goodbye!
Um… What is going on?
Oh. A little bit of extra protection for you. A little bit of security.
translation.zh: ‎给你们的额外保护 一些安全措施

translation.en: Don't worry! We'll pop stickers on your backs.
translation.zh:
‎不用担心！我们只是在你们的背上
‎贴个贴纸

translation.en: -[Carol] Your hands are cold. -[Sean] What's going on our backs?
-[device beeps] -Hey! That is cold!
Sticker like a name badge?
Kind of, yeah. Just so we know where you are,
translation.zh:
‎算是吧
‎这样我们就能知道你们的位置

translation.en: who you are, social distancing.
You're tracking us?
We're keeping you safe.
So it's just for health reasons. So we can keep the machine moving.
translation.zh:
‎只是出于健康原因
‎这样我们就能继续拍摄

translation.en: Understood, yeah.
[Gavin] Hey, gang!
I see you've all met Mr. Best, our new head of security.
translation.zh:
‎看来你们都见过贝斯特先生了
‎我们新上任的安全主管

translation.en: We're in good hands with Mr. Best.
translation.zh: ‎有贝斯特先生的照顾 大家尽管放心

translation.en: He was recently head of security for DaBaby.
translation.zh: ‎他最近曾担任大宝贝的安全主管

translation.en: Lovely lad.
I'm not wearing one of those, man. It's radiation. It's EMF.
translation.zh: ‎我不要贴 伙计 有辐射 那是电磁场

translation.en: Messes with my fucking brain waves. I don't even wear wireless earbuds.
translation.zh:
‎会扰乱我的脑电波
‎我都不戴无线耳机

translation.en: -Hey! -Gavin…
Not your job.
[Sean] He'll do it. He's doing it.
[Gavin] Should we take it easy?
-There you go. -Okay, all done?
-[Carol] A little rough. -That's a little, uh…
What the fuck?
Right, off you go! There's a Golden Globe waiting for you!
translation.zh: ‎好了 去吧！金球奖等着你们呢！

translation.en: Okay, guys, thank you very much. Thank you. Appreciate it.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 十分感谢 谢谢 谢谢配合

translation.en: Shit is getting real on Cliff Beasts.
Was that necessary?
No, just trying to get it in the can, as per instructions.
translation.zh:
‎没有 我只是按指示
‎保证你们完成拍摄

translation.en: No one's gonna go wandering off now, are they?
translation.zh: ‎现在没人会乱跑了 对吧？

translation.en: [Dustin] Maybe Jarrar just wandered off.
translation.zh: ‎或许加拉尔乱跑 跟我们走散了

translation.en: [Lauren] You don't wander off on Everest.
He's a quitter. Once a quitter, always a quitter.
translation.zh:
‎他很容易就打退堂鼓！
‎打过一次 就会打无数次

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] The corporation will not be happy.
I'm beginning to wonder about this corporation.
translation.zh: ‎我开始对这家公司感到疑惑了

translation.en: What is this?
This is Jarrar's reversible polar fleece.
translation.zh: ‎这是加拉尔的双面穿摇粒绒

translation.en: Well, maybe he got tired and he made camp here somewhere.
translation.zh: ‎或许他太累 找地方露营去了

translation.en: I am not so optimistic.
What is that?
-[Lauren] Sweet Jesus in a basket. -[flies buzzing]
Is that Jarrar?
It might not be him.
There are a lot of inexperienced hikers up here.
translation.zh: ‎这里有很多没有经验的徒步旅行者

translation.en: But that is his belt.
That doesn't mean anything. I got the same belt.
translation.zh:
‎但这不代表什么
‎我有条一模一样的腰带

translation.en: Looks like… he's feeding.
It is so large. How does it fly?
translation.zh: ‎它好大 它是怎么飞起来的？

translation.en: [pants] I checked the whole west face. No sign of him.
translation.zh:
‎我检查了整个西面山坡
‎没有他的踪迹

translation.en: -Cut! It's great. -[bell ringing] -What do you think? Is it gonna work? -Hmm.
translation.zh: ‎卡！很好 你觉得呢？可以吗？

translation.en: -I've got one thought. -Yeah.
Fuck Howie.
You're bad!
Hello?
Hello. Is Josh there?
Hold on. Josh!
[Josh] Coming!
Will you turn off the bath?
Hey, Carol. What's up?
Hi. Who was that?
Uh, well, that's Monica.
Who is Monica?
She's the… the server that you liked who waited on us on Valentine's Day.
translation.zh:
‎她是在情人节那天服务我们
‎你喜欢的那个侍应生

translation.en: She's the waitress from Baltaire?
Don't say "waitress" with that tone. She risks her life to feed people!
translation.zh:
‎别用那种语气说“女服务员”
‎她冒着生命危险给大家上菜！

translation.en: -Why is she in my house? -[Josh sighs]
Look, I'm just gonna say this, all right?
translation.zh: ‎听着 我就直接说了 好吗？

translation.en: I'm breaking up with you.
[chuckles] What?
And it's not just about Monica either.
I realized that all you care about is yourself, and not me.
translation.zh:
‎我意识到你只在乎自己
‎根本不在乎我

translation.en: Where is this coming from?
Of course I care. I care about you so much!
translation.zh: ‎我当然在乎你了 我非常在乎你！

translation.en: You care about me so much that you jump on a plane to London during a plague!
translation.zh:
‎你对我的在乎程度深到在疫情期间
‎跳上去伦敦的飞机！

translation.en: -I can't believe this! -[Josh] Say goodbye to Carol!
translation.zh:
‎-真是不可思议！
‎-好了 跟卡罗尔说再见！

translation.en: Who's Carol?
-Pippa? -Hmm? Do you wanna have sex with me?
translation.zh: ‎皮帕 你想跟我滚床单吗？

translation.en: I'm eating, blud.
Sorry. Sorry.
Gunther?
I'm done eating, but I'm okay, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎我吃完了 但还是算了 谢谢你的好意

translation.en: [Carol] Hi.
Dr. Lacie.
-I dreamed it would be you. -You did?
-My name is Zaki. -Oh, I was gonna ask you.
-Let's talk. -Okay.
Hello!
-Hey, Rafi! -Point the camera up.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 拉斐！
‎-让摄像头对着上面

translation.en: -Move the camera. -Fine.
[Dustin] Let me see that…
-[Lauren] Hi! -Nice 'stache.
How's the homework?
I'm quitting high school. I don't need it. My friends said I can get a trust fund.
translation.zh:
‎我要从高中退学 我不需要上学
‎我朋友说我可以拿到信托基金

translation.en: -Guess what? -What?
Mommy and Papa are back together.
Mom, I thought you were dating the guy who used to be on Friends!
translation.zh:
‎妈妈 我还以为你在跟演过
‎《老友记》的那家伙约会！

translation.en: -Raphael, stop it! -Dad is the devil!
translation.zh:
‎-拉斐尔 别说了！
‎-爸爸很坏！

translation.en: What?
He's never gonna change! I googled him. He's done some fucked-up shit.
translation.zh:
‎他不会变的！我在网上搜过他了
‎他做了不少烂事

translation.en: I've gotta finish my game. Bye!
translation.zh: ‎我要打完这局游戏 再见！

translation.en: Rafi!
What a nightmare!
-Ever wonder if we picked the right kid? -Don't say that.
translation.zh:
‎-你有没有怀疑过我们挑错了孩子？
‎-别这么说

translation.en: No, when we got him, they said he was just shy and that he'd warm up,
translation.zh:
‎不 我们领养他时 他们说他就是害羞
‎会跟我们亲近起来

translation.en: but he never warmed up--
translation.zh: ‎但他一直跟我们亲近不起来…

translation.en: [Rafi] I can hear you!
Man, you guys are a bag full of dicks!
translation.zh: ‎你们俩就是彻彻底底的混蛋！

translation.en: Fuck!
No!
That was…
There's no coming back from that.
I don't think we're allowed to leave the hotel. I signed something.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该不能离开酒店 我签合同了

translation.en: We're 18. They expect us to do this.
translation.zh: ‎我们18岁了 他们有心理准备

translation.en: Okay, let's go to London.
Make me smile.
Hello, I'm Kate.
Welcome to your 30-minute morning stretch.
translation.zh: ‎欢迎来到你的30分钟晨间拉伸

translation.en: Are you ready to start a new day with new habits?
translation.zh:
‎准备好以新的习惯
‎开始新的一天了吗？

translation.en: Change me. Change me.
-Great! -Change me.
I'm ready too.
Let's go. We're just gonna start with a really easy swing.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我们先从一个简单的摇摆开始

translation.en: No stress. Great.
Let's come down.
Let's just take a moment to connect with the earth.
-Dieter. -Huh?
You're kind of cute.
I like your hair.
For our next exercise,
I would like you to enter me for 30 thrusts.
Let's do that ten times,
and continue until I say we're done.
That's a lot of sets.
-[both panting] -I love you, Dr. Lacie.
I love you too. But it's Carol.
translation.zh: ‎我也爱你 但我是卡罗尔

translation.en: [moans] Carol Lacie.
-No, just Carol! -[both gasp]
Dr. Carol.
-No, I'm not a doctor. -[grunts]
Kate?
Are you me?
I'm you. You're me. I'm horny. Who cares?
translation.zh:
‎我就是你 你就是我
‎我很饥渴 有什么区别？

translation.en: This is creepy, but I like it.
Shut up. Get over here.
Yes, ma'am.
I don't understand!
Did you?
No.
I never orgasm.
[Kate, repeating] Are you ready to start a new day?
[Dieter] I'm sorry.
Ronjon, make sure you spend time on that pineapple. Each groove.
translation.zh:
‎荣乔 一定好好处理这个菠萝
‎每个凹陷都照顾到

translation.en: All right.
Thank you.
Oh, my God.
I think I'm sick.
Yeah, you're sick with love.
No, I think it's the virus.
You can't have the virus. We're in the bubble.
translation.zh: ‎你不可能感染病毒 我们都在泡泡里

translation.en: Bola, hold my hair.
Your hair is short. There is no hair to hold!
translation.zh: ‎你是短头发 没有头发可抓！

translation.en: [groaning] Hold my hair!
Uh, I don't want to be here. I want to resign.
translation.zh: ‎我不想在这里了 我想辞职

translation.en: [sobbing] Bola…
[hesitates] I really don't want to.
-I'm not supposed to be here. -[sobs] Bola…
Where do I hold? Okay!
[Bola] No! No, no, no, no!
[Gavin] Okay, guys? Uh, listen up.
Uh, I've got some very important health news for you.
translation.zh: ‎我要宣布一个很重要的健康消息

translation.en: -You all tested negative for the virus. -Yes!
translation.zh:
‎-你们的核酸检测结果都是阴性
‎-太好了！

translation.en: However, some of you have tested positive for influenza.
-The good virus. -[Gunther] The good one.
translation.zh: ‎这是无害的病毒 ‎无害的 没错

translation.en: Two of you tested positive
for two separate cases of sexually transmitted diseases.
How'd we get the flu? We're in the bubble.
translation.zh:
‎我们怎么可能得流感呢？
‎我们被隔离了

translation.en: [Gavin] We've narrowed it down to a delivery person
translation.zh: ‎我们已经把范围缩小到快递员

translation.en: and one of the gardeners. We are handling it.
translation.zh: ‎和一个园丁了 ‎我们正在解决

translation.en: If this is just the normal flu,
we could push on and complete the day, right?
translation.zh:
‎我们应该可以继续推进
‎完成今天的拍摄 对吗？

translation.en: Absolutely, yeah.
Actors are some of the toughest people I know. We can handle it.
translation.zh:
‎演员们都是最坚强的人
‎我知道我们可以应对

translation.en: I once played host to a 30-foot-long tapeworm
translation.zh: ‎一只九米的绦虫曾经寄生在我身上

translation.en: during Cliff Beasts 2, and nobody even knew.
translation.zh:
‎在《悬崖野兽2》的时候
‎都没有人知道

translation.en: I broke my wrist and ankle on the last movie I did.
translation.zh:
‎我拍上一部电影时
‎手腕和脚踝都断了

translation.en: -I didn't tell anybody. -Good lad. That's the spirit.
translation.zh:
‎-我没告诉任何人
‎-好孩子 就是这种精神

translation.en: I'm very concerned about Carol and Dieter.
I think they should at least have the rest of the day off.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得他们今天至少应该休息

translation.en: We're not shutting this down for a bit of snot.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我们不能因为一点小感冒
‎就停止拍摄

translation.en: Let's have a show of hands, okay? Who wants to power through today?
translation.zh:
‎我们举手表决一下 好吗？
‎谁今天想挺过去？

translation.en: Right, let's get out there and kill some cliff beasts!
translation.zh:
‎好的 我们去山上
‎杀几头悬崖野兽吧！

translation.en: -[actors] Yeah! -Yes!
I can hear something!
The nest must be close.
You guys better get moving, or you're gonna be bird seed.
translation.zh: ‎你们最好快点爬 否则就会变成鸟粮

translation.en: I don't feel so good.
We should do this another day.
-You got this. -[Dustin] Lauren?
-[sighs] -Lauren!
Something's up with Lauren.
I can't do this anymore.
[Carol] Oh, my God, I'm gonna throw up.
[Krystal] Please don't because then I will too.
translation.zh: ‎千万别 因为你吐我也会想吐

translation.en: Winners never quit, and quitters never win!
translation.zh:
‎成功者绝不会放弃
‎放弃者绝不会成功！

translation.en: I don't wanna act anymore. I wanna go back to the room.
translation.zh: ‎我不想演了 我想回房间

translation.en: Let's shoot it quickly. You'll be proud when it's done.
translation.zh: ‎我们快点拍 拍完后你会很有自豪感

translation.en: Carol, can you stop gaslighting me?
translation.zh: ‎卡罗尔 能别对我“煤气灯操纵”吗？

translation.en: Gaslighting? That is not gaslighting. You know what? Your generation sucks!
translation.zh:
‎“煤气灯操纵”？这不是煤气灯操纵
‎知道吗？你们这代人烂透了！

translation.en: At least I'm not a baby boomer.
translation.zh: ‎至少我没在婴儿潮的时候出生

translation.en: I'm not a baby boomer. I am Generation Y, thank you very much.
translation.zh:
‎我不是婴儿潮期间出生的
‎我是Y世代 十分感谢

translation.en: Ladies, this is no time for catfighting.
translation.zh: ‎女士们 你俩就别斗嘴了

translation.en: I saw a photo of you at a Nirvana concert.
translation.zh: ‎我看到了你在涅槃演唱会上的照片

translation.en: [scoffs] No, you didn't. That wasn't me.
translation.zh: ‎不 你没有 那不是我

translation.en: It doesn't look like they're climbing.
Right, like, why don't they have ropes?
translation.zh: ‎对 他们身上怎么没系绳索？

translation.en: And would they let the little girl free climb a cliff like this?
translation.zh:
‎他们怎么会让那个小女孩
‎自由攀登悬崖？

translation.en: Would she even know how to do it?
-I think she's unconscious. -I think Lauren seems fine.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得她没意识了
‎-我觉得劳伦没什么大碍

translation.en: Wake up, Lauren. Come on. Climb.
translation.zh: ‎醒醒 劳伦 快点 继续爬

translation.en: For your first time free climbing, you're doing a great job, guys!
translation.zh:
‎这是你们第一次自由攀登
‎你们爬得很不错 各位！

translation.en: Okay, guys, I really think I'm gonna throw up.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 我真觉得我要吐了

translation.en: [Dustin] Maybe call the set medic?
translation.zh: ‎或许我们应该找片场医务人员？

translation.en: I don't like it when people throw up.
Oh, God.
-Should we bring them down? -Let's just see how it plays out.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要把他们放下来吗？
‎-看看接下来会怎样吧

translation.en: Should we be concerned about this level of vomit? Just 'cause, you know…
translation.zh:
‎这种程度的呕吐
‎我们要担心吗？因为…

translation.en: There's something going round.
-[Bola] It smells like ham or something. -Shh. It's okay.
I need touch-ups on hair and makeup, please!
-[stomach gurgling] -Can hair and makeup step in, please?
translation.zh: ‎能给我整理一下妆发吗 谢谢？

translation.en: Hey, Lauren? Who would you say is the most fun person to act with?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 劳伦？
‎你觉得谁是最有趣的搭档？

translation.en: Gavin, there's no time for recuperation.
translation.zh: ‎加文 没时间让他们恢复了

translation.en: You have to get the dinosaurs flying again.
-I'm not a magician. -I know you're not a fucking magician!
translation.zh:
‎-宝拉 我不是魔术师！
‎-我知道你不是魔术师！

translation.en: If you were, you could pull a movie out of your ass!
translation.zh: ‎如果你是 早就把电影拉出来了！

translation.en: Oh, my God, it's Minnie Driver. [gasps] I love her.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 是明妮德里弗 我好爱她

translation.en: You know, these are human beings. They're not machines.
Bucko, need I remind you, you used to be addicted to meth.
translation.zh:
‎小伙子 需要我提醒你吗？
‎你以前吸冰毒上瘾

translation.en: Once you stayed up for three weeks, did something bad, and I covered for you.
translation.zh:
‎有一次你三个星期都没睡觉 ‎做了件很过分的事情
‎我替你瞒了下来

translation.en: Okay, yes, I remember. Thank you for reminding me, Paula.
translation.zh: ‎是的 我记得 谢谢你提醒我 宝拉

translation.en: If I'd ever told anyone, you'd be in jail for the rest of your life.
translation.zh:
‎如果我告诉别人
‎你后半辈子都会在牢里度过

translation.en: Don't make me get tough. I don't like to get tough.
translation.zh: ‎别让我狠起心来 我不喜欢来硬的

translation.en: You do like being tough. You love it.
translation.zh: ‎你喜欢来硬的 你很喜欢

translation.en: Can I put something into perspective for you?
We are one of two movies in production right now.
translation.zh:
‎现在只有两部电影在拍
‎我们是其中一部

translation.en: -It's us and Tom Cruise. -[Gavin] Yeah.
If we fail, a $50 billion corporation is going to go down.
translation.zh:
‎如果我们失败了
‎一家市值500亿美元的公司就会破产

translation.en: People murder each other over ten grand.
translation.zh: ‎人们会为了一万美元互相残杀

translation.en: What do you think they're gonna do over $50 billion?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得如果是500亿美元
‎他们会做出什么事来？

translation.en: You ass! [gasps]
Oh, dear.
Okay, so Mel Gibson is on the boat, and I think he thinks we're dating.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 梅尔吉布森在船上
‎他好像认为我们在约会

translation.en: We did stuff last night. He's taking it too seriously.
translation.zh:
‎我们昨晚做了一件事
‎他现在有点过于认真了

translation.en: What did you do?
Just over-the-pants stuff.
Guy, what's up?
Oh! Listen! I've got so many presents for you.
These people, they don't even care about what they have.
translation.zh: ‎这些人根本不在乎自己有什么

translation.en: Yeah, I've got soap. I've got cream.
translation.zh: ‎对 我有香皂 还有面霜

translation.en: I've got… You need a corkscrew? I'm gonna send you two corkscrews.
translation.zh:
‎我还有…你需要开瓶器吗？
‎我要给你寄两个开瓶器

translation.en: There's Bibles everywhere, in every room. They don't even read them!
translation.zh:
‎到处都是《圣经》 所有房间都有
‎他们都不读！

translation.en: I'm gonna send it to you so we can pray for them 'cause they're all going to hell.
translation.zh:
‎我要把这些书寄给你 我们就可以
‎为他们祈祷了 因为他们都会下地狱

translation.en: -They're mistreating you. -Mmm.
Makes me furious.
You know what you need to do?
You need to lead a revolution.
Yes, revolution.
You're like little cogs in the machine. Don't you see it?
translation.zh:
‎你们就像机器上的小齿轮
‎你看不出来吗？

translation.en: They've been using you!
You're going to burn down the machinery of corporate capitalism.
translation.zh: ‎你们将摧毁公司资本主义的机器

translation.en: -Yes. -They are not the power.
You are the power! Only you can make the change!
translation.zh:
‎权力应该在你手中！
‎只有你能做出改变！

translation.en: It has to be me!
It has to be you.
We are working too many hours, and we are way over schedule.
translation.zh:
‎我们工作时间太长了
‎我们的拍摄已经超出计划了

translation.en: It is unfair and unsafe.
Carol, why do you want us to bail? Just tell us why.
translation.zh:
‎卡罗尔 你为什么想让我们造反呢？
‎告诉我们原因

translation.en: I'm not saying "bail." I'm saying "threaten to bail."
translation.zh:
‎我没说要“造反”
‎我说的是“威胁造反”

translation.en: We're all gonna team up together, like the cast of Friends?
translation.zh:
‎我们要像《老友记》的演员们一样
‎团结起来吗？

translation.en: -No. -You want us to bribe them then?
translation.zh:
‎-不
‎-那你是想让我们贿赂他们吗？

translation.en: -Not what I'm saying. -You want us to blackmail the studio.
translation.zh:
‎-我不是这个意思
‎-你想让我们勒索电影公司

translation.en: What are you not hearing?
Every day, I eat the KitKat in the minibar,
translation.zh: ‎每天我都会吃一条小冰箱里的奇巧

translation.en: and then I come back and there's a new KitKat.
translation.zh: ‎然后我再去拿 就会有一条新的奇巧

translation.en: I'm not giving this up.
I knew she was gonna do this. I knew you were gonna do this.
translation.zh:
‎我就知道她会这样做
‎我就知道你会这样做

translation.en: What did I tell everybody? Not to have her come back,
translation.zh: ‎我怎么跟大家说的？别让她回来

translation.en: because you are a leaver, and you are trying to get us to be leavers too.
translation.zh:
‎因为你是个中途离开的人
‎你也想拉我们都做这种人

translation.en: -I thought you forgave me. -Did I?
translation.zh:
‎-我还以为你原谅我了
‎-我有吗？

translation.en: -You said you did. -Did I?
-Lauren! -I just hadn't seen you in a while.
Hey, little girl over there, why are you always here?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 那边的小姑娘
‎你为什么一直跟着我们？

translation.en: My dad's the stunt coordinator.
He doesn't love me, so…
All right, uh, maybe we should vote on this.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 或许我们该投个票

translation.en: Okay, let's do it. Who's in?
This is great! Let's go make our demands!
No, we're in to finish the movie.
translation.zh: ‎不 我们赞成的是拍完电影

translation.en: That's not what I said! I said, "Are you in to be out of the movie?"
translation.zh:
‎我说的不是这个！
‎我说的是“大家赞成退出电影吗？”

translation.en: Then you should have said out!
No. I explained the plan, and then I said, "Are you in for the plan?"
translation.zh:
‎不 我解释了计划 然后我说：
‎“你们赞成这个计划吗？”

translation.en: Why would we listen to someone who doesn't know how voting works?
translation.zh:
‎我们为什么要听一个
‎连投票规则都搞不懂的人？

translation.en: Guys, I am proud of you.
translation.zh: ‎各位 我非常为你们自豪

translation.en: Do you understand that, together, we can do anything?
translation.zh:
‎大家明白吗？
‎团结起来 我们将无所不能

translation.en: And I'm manifesting right now, for all of us, a classic!
translation.zh: ‎我在给大家展示经典的煽动方式！

translation.en: -[Dustin] Yeah! -Yeah.
That's where it's at.
Hey, no, stop! This is not finished yet. You stole my meeting!
translation.zh:
‎嘿 打住！我还没说完呢
‎你把我的会议抢走了！

translation.en: Cliff Beasts 6!
Mr. Best, is all this necessary?
translation.zh:
‎贝斯塔先生
‎有必要搞这么大的阵仗吗？

translation.en: Maybe, maybe not.
This is a hotel, not a war zone.
My job's to look after these people, not imprison them.
translation.zh: ‎我的职责是照看他们 不是囚禁他们

translation.en: You don't care about them. You just wanna get the job done!
translation.zh:
‎你不才在乎这些人
‎你只想快点拍完电影！

translation.en: Like a sergeant pretends to care about the soldiers before he sends them off
translation.zh:
‎就像中士假装关心手下的士兵
‎然后马上把他们送去战场

translation.en: to die.
Now, let's finish this film and go home!
translation.zh: ‎我们赶紧拍完电影 滚回家吧！

translation.en: -Hey, Gavin? -Hi.
What's going on? All my lines are gone from the next scene.
translation.zh:
‎怎么回事？
‎我下个场景一句台词都没了

translation.en: Oh, that can't be true. She has lines in this, doesn't she?
translation.zh: ‎不可能 她有台词吧 对吗？

translation.en: Uh, only nonverbal lines.
But I'm supposed to emotionally connect with the baby cliff beast.
translation.zh: ‎但是我应该和小悬崖野兽产生情感的

translation.en: Oh, yes! That's right. The studio wanted Krystal to do that because she's young.
translation.zh:
‎没错！电影公司想交给克丽丝托
‎因为她年轻

translation.en: I'm young.
They thought she'd connect more with the baby beast.
translation.zh:
‎他们觉得她会更容易
‎和小野兽发生感情

translation.en: -[Carol scoffs] Why? -Well, she's the baby.
And you're not now.
The studio know that you're overworked. And they heard you.
translation.zh:
‎电影公司知道你工作量太大了
‎他们听到你的诉求了

translation.en: -What do you mean, "They heard me"? What? -They heard you.
translation.zh:
‎-什么叫“他们听到我的诉求”了？
‎-他们听到你的诉求了

translation.en: I got you now, you son of a bitch.
No.
Cole, put that goddamn gun down.
That baby dinosaur has just as much right to be on this planet as we do.
translation.zh:
‎这个小恐龙和我们一样
‎有在这个星球生存的权利

translation.en: It's not about the planet.
It's about justice!
[Krystal] No, put it down!
God damn it, Vivian.
How can you be so naive?
These things are killers.
They killed Jarrar, and they killed your parents!
translation.zh:
‎它们害死了加拉尔
‎还害死了你父母！

translation.en: [gasps] They killed your parents dead.
Not all of them are beasts.
But maybe some of us are!
Vivian, what are you doing? Come here! Get back here now! Shit.
translation.zh:
‎薇薇安 你要做什么？
‎回来！快回到这里！该死

translation.en: You're gonna wind up dead, like your momma!
translation.zh: ‎你会命丧黄泉 和你妈妈一样！

translation.en: -[growls] -Come here, little guy.
He's just hungry.
It's like she's dino psychic.
translation.zh: ‎她好像能跟恐龙进行心灵沟通

translation.en: You're safe now. No one's gonna hurt you.
translation.zh: ‎你现在很安全 没人会伤害你

translation.en: If that thing moves, I'm gonna blow its fucking head off.
translation.zh:
‎如果那玩意敢动一下
‎我就把它的脑袋崩掉

translation.en: Wow.
-Okay. -[baby cliff beast squeals]
[whispering] He's learning
from her.
Okay, let's see if you can do these steps.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 看看你会不会这样跳

translation.en: Very good. Very good.
Wow.
Looks like we're about to have us a hoedown.
translation.zh: ‎看来我们要来一场乡村舞会了

translation.en: [chuckles] All right, here we go.
[in ambiguous accent] Now I know
I must kill them all.
[Darren] And cut!
Really nice work.
Can you stop? You don't need to do that anymore.
Hey, you looked amazing!
Darren, this is such bullshit.
That was supposed to be my big scene, and now all I do is piss myself.
translation.zh:
‎这本来该是我的大场面
‎现在我却只能尿裤子

translation.en: Urination is a very real and human reaction
translation.zh:
‎排尿是非常真实的
‎这是人类受到悬崖野兽

translation.en: to getting roared at by a cliff beast.
-It's humiliating! -I wouldn't worry about it.
translation.zh:
‎-太侮辱人了！
‎-换作是我就不会发愁

translation.en: We've got to serve the Cliff Beast nerds, the fans out there.
translation.zh:
‎我们要为
‎《悬崖野兽》的脑残粉服务！

translation.en: They want authenticity.
Krystal just did a fucking TikTok with a dinosaur. Is that authentic?
translation.zh:
‎克丽丝托刚才跟恐龙跳抖音舞
‎这也叫真实吗？

translation.en: That dance is the clip they're gonna use in the Oscars.
translation.zh:
‎那支舞是他们要在奥斯卡上用的
‎片段剪辑

translation.en: -What? No, they're not. -Oh, believe me.
Gavin, we gotta shut down, buckle down, focus, and I will rewrite that script.
translation.zh:
‎加文 我们要停止拍摄
‎下定决心 专心致志 我会重写剧本

translation.en: You give me two weeks, and I'll have it rocking.
translation.zh:
‎你给我两周时间
‎我会让这个剧本大放异彩

translation.en: [Gavin] Shut down for two weeks?
translation.zh:
‎-我们要停拍两周吗？
‎-对 就像《现代启示录》一样

translation.en: Yeah, like they did with Apocalypse Now. That's the model.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要停拍两周吗？
‎-对 就像《现代启示录》一样 ‎他们树立了榜样

translation.en: -What? -We are not shutting down for two weeks.
We told Rafi we'd be gone for three months.
translation.zh: ‎我们当初跟拉斐说只离开三个月

translation.en: It's been five and a half!
I didn't come all this way to not have it work out.
translation.zh: ‎我费了这么大劲 不能白费心血

translation.en: Rafi will understand when he sees how great the movie is.
translation.zh:
‎等拉斐看到这电影有多精彩后
‎他会理解的

translation.en: None of these movies are great.
Hey, I am modeling for him the value of hard work
translation.zh: ‎嘿 我是在给他做榜样 证明辛勤工作

translation.en: and perseverance and responsibility.
That is the best thing a father can do for a child.
translation.zh: ‎这是父亲能给孩子最好的爱

translation.en: No, the best thing a parent can do is be present.
translation.zh:
‎不对 父母能给孩子最好的爱
‎就是陪伴

translation.en: I told you, my dad took him out to lunch at Nobu, and he seemed fine.
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说过 我爸带他去松久信幸
‎吃午饭了 他看起来没事

translation.en: -You think he's fine? -Yeah.
He started a GoFundMe for a kidney transplant!
translation.zh:
‎他为一个肾脏移植病人
‎创建了公开筹款！

translation.en: How much did he raise? $79,000!
Kid's an entrepreneur.
He's only been a part of our family for 17 months!
I hate to say this,
but this franchise has been in my life a lot longer than Rafi has.
translation.zh:
‎但这个系列在我生命中的时间
‎比拉斐长得多

translation.en: You are so screwed up.
I'm gonna make sure that you get put on some no-adoption list!
translation.zh: ‎我要把你弄上禁止收养名单！

translation.en: -Please, will you do that? -You'll never adopt again!
translation.zh:
‎-你会这样做吗？
‎-你永远都别想领养孩子了！

translation.en: Oh, yeah? I'll adopt again.
I'll adopt half of South America if I want!
translation.zh:
‎如果我想
‎可以领养半个南美洲的孩子！

translation.en: You know, Peru, Chile, Venezuela. Come on, you're living with me!
translation.zh:
‎秘鲁、智利、委内瑞拉
‎来吧 和我一起生活！

translation.en: [Carol] What are you doing?
I'm packing.
You're leaving?
-Yeah, tomorrow we have a game. -Oh.
-Didn't I tell you? -No.
So what do we do now? I mean, can I get your email?
translation.zh:
‎那我们现在怎么办？
‎你能告诉我你的邮箱吗？

translation.en: Of course.
Okay, what is it?
-Oh, you want it now? -Mm-hmm.
Oh, but I'm packing.
Okay, what is going on?
-What? -[Carol] I'm a bit confused.
I thought we had something serious.
Here's the thing. I'm married.
What?
I have five kids.
-You have five kids? -With three different women.
translation.zh:
‎-你有五个孩子？
‎-分别和三个女人生的

translation.en: -With three different women? -I have three more coming.
translation.zh:
‎-分别和三个女人生的？
‎-还有三个快出生了

translation.en: With two other women.
Wow. Okay, so,
maybe I should call your wife.
translation.zh: ‎或许我应该给你妻子打电话

translation.en: Really? You'd do that?
Yes, you better believe it.
Oh, she will love it! She's a huge fan of yours.
translation.zh: ‎她会开心死！她是你的铁杆粉丝

translation.en: Okay, I'm sorry, I just… I don't know what's happening.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 很抱歉 我…
‎我不知道这是怎么回事

translation.en: We have a very European relationship with my wife.
Okay, what does that mean?
That I'm allowed to have sex with you.
Oh, wow.
Okay, this is… What?
No, don't be sad.
You had fun.
Now, I meant to ask you,
do you have PayPal?
Yes?
Because that KitKat and that water you had last night?
translation.zh:
‎记得昨晚你吃的奇巧
‎和喝的那瓶水吗？

translation.en: It cost £26.
Anika…
-You're working the night shift? -Yes, I do.
translation.zh: ‎安妮卡…你值夜班吗？ ‎对 没错

translation.en: I see the way you look at me.
Yeah, I feel the same way, and I want you to know
translation.zh: ‎对 我有着同样的感觉 我希望你知道

translation.en: I wanna rip your clothes off and have my way with you like an animal.
translation.zh:
‎我想把你的衣服撕下来
‎像动物那样跟你做那种事

translation.en: -That's amazing. -Yeah, it is.
-But-- -Hi.
Where are you guys going?
Um… To help him plunge his toilet.
I'll do it. I'll plunge his toilet.
translation.zh: ‎交给我吧 我帮他通马桶

translation.en: Let me handle his toilet.
I would plunge the hell out of your toilet.
I would. Let me plunge your toilet.
translation.zh: ‎我会的 让我通开你的马桶

translation.en: I want to plunge this toilet!
I'm only trying to take care of you,
so you don't find yourself in the wrong toilet.
translation.zh: ‎这样你就不会发现自己通错马桶了

translation.en: You're not in charge of which toilet I should plunge!
translation.zh: ‎你管不着我应该通哪个马桶！

translation.en: I'm just doing what's right for you and his toilet, which I will now plunge.
translation.zh:
‎我这样做都是为了你和他的马桶
‎我现在就去给他通

translation.en: I will handle this toilet. I'm gonna clean your toilet.
translation.zh:
‎这个马桶就交给我
‎我会清理好你的马桶

translation.en: Sir, let's go. Thank you, Anika.
translation.zh: ‎先生 我们走 谢谢你 安妮卡

translation.en: Where are you?
[Josh] I'm in our bed.
It's so cozy and warm. Feels like home.
translation.zh: ‎非常温暖舒适 很有家的感觉

translation.en: I can't wait till this movie's over. I miss being there with you sometimes.
translation.zh:
‎我等不及电影拍完了
‎有时我想念和你在一起的日子

translation.en: I'm sorry this has been so hard.
Hey, what's going on?
[sighs] Carol's still not over it.
-Oh, poor girl. -Yeah, she's really struggling right now.
translation.zh:
‎-可怜的姑娘
‎-对 她现在还是很痛苦

translation.en: What? You can't just live in my house with your new girlfriend!
translation.zh:
‎什么？你不能和你的新女友
‎住在我家！

translation.en: Hey, I'm house-sitting for you for free! Pump the brakes, Carol!
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我可是在免费为你看家！
‎你生什么气 卡罗尔！

translation.en: -Hey, what do you want from Postmates? -We did Chinese last night, right?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 你想点什么外卖？
‎-我们昨晚点了中餐 对吧？

translation.en: -I could do Thai? -I could do Thai.
translation.zh:
‎-可以点泰餐吗？
‎-我可以吃泰餐

translation.en: Do not Postmates to my house! I'm coming home right now!
translation.zh: ‎不要在我家点外卖！我现在就回家！

translation.en: -What the fuck are you doing? -I'm locking the script.
You won't be needing these anymore. You know why? Because you're done!
translation.zh:
‎你不再需要这些东西了
‎知道为什么吗？因为你完了！

translation.en: Back away!
-Eddie Vedder gave me that guitar! -I don't care!
translation.zh:
‎-这吉他是艾迪维达送我的！
‎-我不在乎！

translation.en: -That doesn't bother me. -Oh, no?
My work is in the cloud.
Are you sure, SummerBoy1987? [manic laugh]
That's my cloud!
-It's not anymore! -[line ringing]
Rafi, look in the camera!
Look at Daddy's computer.
Mommy lit it on fire because Daddy's script is in the computer!
translation.zh:
‎妈妈把它点着了
‎因为爸爸的剧本都在电脑里！

translation.en: Daddy's trying to make a movie that's not a piece of shit,
like Mommy likes to make.
Your mom's a hack, Rafi!
I don't care.
I don't like movies. They're too long! Bye.
translation.zh: ‎我不喜欢电影 太长了！再见

translation.en: Well, this hack is gonna go home and take care of our little angel.
translation.zh: ‎本黑客要回家照顾我们的小天使了

translation.en: He's no angel.
You think the cat drowned itself?
Just so you know, I know that this thing is never gonna happen again!
translation.zh:
‎你要知道 我知道这种事
‎永远不会再发生了！

translation.en: Rafi! Momma's coming home!
[Lauren] Freedom!
[screams] Oh, my God!
[Best] That's wonderful work.
That's my tennis hand, you motherfucker!
translation.zh: ‎我用这只手打网球 你这王八蛋！

translation.en: [gasps in fright] Gavin!
-He got my fingers! -You trying to escape too?
translation.zh:
‎-他打掉了我的手指！
‎-你也想逃跑吗？

translation.en: Of course not. I just heard a commotion.
translation.zh: ‎当然不了 我只是听到了骚动

translation.en: Calm down. [grunts]
-[loud gasp] -What the hell's going on?
-What are you doing? Why did you hit him? -[screaming]
-Oh, what did you do to your hand? -You did this!
translation.zh:
‎-你对自己的手做了什么？
‎-明明要怪你！

translation.en: I will sort this. Go back inside.
-Did you fall in the gravel? -No! This is all your fault!
translation.zh:
‎-你摔在碎石上了吗？
‎-不！这都是你的错！

translation.en: The therapist said not to blame. Don't blame me!
translation.zh: ‎心理医生说不要责怪别人 别怪我！

translation.en: What the hell is going on here?
The security guards, they got confused.
They thought that Lauren was a deranged fan, and they shot her,
translation.zh:
‎他们还以为劳伦是狂热的粉丝
‎所以开枪打了她

translation.en: and she lost a few fingers.
She'll be fine. Just a few digits.
translation.zh: ‎她不会有事 几根手指而已

translation.en: Just a graze.
Nothing to worry about.
Gavin, you can't shoot the actors.
translation.zh: ‎加文 你不能开枪打演员

translation.en: You can't even poison the fuckers these days. The press always finds out.
translation.zh:
‎现在连毒死那些混蛋都不行
‎媒体总会发现的

translation.en: It wasn't my call to shoot them. Mr. Best reports to you.
translation.zh:
‎向他们开枪不是我的决定
‎你是贝斯特先生的上司

translation.en: -Mr. Best? Sorry, who's Mr. Best? -[elephant trumpets on screen]
translation.zh: ‎贝斯特先生？抱歉 这人是谁？

translation.en: I thought you sent him.
Mr. Best? I don't… That does not ring a bell.
translation.zh:
‎贝斯特先生？
‎我不…我一点印象都没有

translation.en: Sounds scary. Sounds like someone you wouldn't wanna fuck with.
translation.zh:
‎听上去很可怕 听上去像一个
‎让人“性趣”全无的人

translation.en: Someone who'd do anything to make sure the movie got made.
translation.zh:
‎一个会用尽一切手段
‎确保电影完成的人

translation.en: Okay.
We need to shut down.
-We're not shutting the movie down. -We are shutting down the movie.
translation.zh:
‎-我们不能停拍电影
‎-我们要停拍电影

translation.en: -We are not shutting down the movie. -[yells] We are shutting down the movie!
translation.zh:
‎-我们不能停拍电影
‎-我们要停拍电影 宝拉！

translation.en: It's not like the world is desperate for another Cliff Beasts movie!
translation.zh:
‎没了下一部《悬崖野兽》
‎地球又不是不转了！

translation.en: This isn't a vaccine!
This is a Cliff Beasts movie. There's five of them.
translation.zh:
‎只是一部《悬崖野兽》电影而已
‎已经有五部了

translation.en: They're all the same!
Sorry, I was frozen there for a second,
but I assume you were agreeing with everything I was saying,
translation.zh: ‎但我认为你同意我说的每一点

translation.en: and I'm so glad because if you don't get the movie in the can,
translation.zh: ‎我很高兴 因为如果电影不拍完

translation.en: I'll send one of these fucking elephants to trample your house and your children.
translation.zh:
‎我就会派其中一头大象
‎踩烂你的房子和孩子

translation.en: Okay? Hakuna matata, my sweet. [kisses]
translation.zh: ‎好吗？哈库纳马塔塔 亲爱的

translation.en: -[line disconnects] -Wow.
I so wanna be her.
Hi, Tom.
I hate to tell you this,
