but I don't think we have enough time or money to finish this Cliff Beasts--
translation.zh:
‎但我觉得我们没有足够的时间
‎还有资金完成这部《悬崖野兽》…

translation.en: Great, then just get it done and we'll be in touch.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 赶紧拍好 保持联系

translation.en: I don't think it's possible to get it done.
Don't make an enemy of me, Paula. I will destroy you from within!
translation.zh:
‎别跟我作对 宝拉
‎我会摧毁你的内心防线！

translation.en: Okay, Tom. Thank you for this opportunity.
translation.zh: ‎好的 汤姆 谢谢你给我这次机会

translation.en: -Hello? -[Tom] Li.
The schedule's impossible with the budget we have.
Great. Then get it done and we will be in touch.
translation.zh: ‎没问题 赶紧拍好 我们保持联系

translation.en: No, Li, you don't understand. This is impossible.
translation.zh: ‎不 李 你不理解 这不可能

translation.en: I have faith in you. You have never let me down before.
translation.zh: ‎我对你有信心 你从未让我失望过

translation.en: Wait.
Are you in Fiji?
-Yes, I'm in Fiji. -I'm down the beach!
translation.zh:
‎-对 我在斐济
‎-我在海滩上！

translation.en: I have not seen anyone in 37 days!
-You want to play tennis? -I would love to play tennis!
translation.zh:
‎-你想打网球吗？
‎-我太想跟你打网球了！

translation.en: -Four o'clock? -Four o'clock!
Do you have balls? Oh, I have balls! [chuckles]
I spoke to Lauren this morning.
She loves you all, and she said the best thing that you could do for her
translation.zh:
‎她爱你们所有人
‎她说你们能给她最大的慰藉

translation.en: would be to make this movie great.
I spoke to her too, and she is not being cool about it.
translation.zh: ‎我也跟她谈了 她意见很大

translation.en: She's really pissed at me like it's my fault.
translation.zh: ‎她非常生我的气 好像是我的错一样

translation.en: I didn't shoot her fingers off.
Mr. Best's team thought that you were being attacked by a crazed stalker.
translation.zh:
‎贝斯特先生的团队误以为
‎你们被一个疯狂的跟踪者袭击

translation.en: Were they able to reattach her fingers?
translation.zh: ‎他们能把她的手指接回去吗？

translation.en: -They, uh, didn't find any of them. -[Darren gasps]
-All that's left is a thumb. -This is a blessing.
translation.zh:
‎-只剩下一根拇指了
‎-这是一种恩赐 好吗？

translation.en: Lauren is gonna come back from this stronger.
translation.zh: ‎劳伦经历过这次劫难后 会更加强大

translation.en: There are a million things you can do with a thumb. It's not like it's a pinkie.
translation.zh:
‎用大拇指能做很多很多事
‎小拇指就不是这样

translation.en: When will she shoot the rest of her scenes?
Well, we're not gonna shoot the rest of her scenes. Lauren is wrapped.
translation.zh: ‎她剩下的戏就不拍了 劳伦杀青了

translation.en: We've got some clever fixes I don't think anybody's gonna notice.
translation.zh:
‎我们有一些聪明的修复方法
‎观众应该看不出来

translation.en: So are we allowed to leave?
We can't do that, unfortunately. You have to stay 'cause we have contracts.
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉 我们不能放你们走
‎你们必须留下来 因为我们签合同了

translation.en: It's called being an adult.
Fucking Jesus Christ.
[Gavin] Uh, one hiccup. Shouldn't be too much of a problem.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 现在有个小困难
‎但应该不会有什么影响

translation.en: Our stunt coordinator, Steve, has had a bit of a virus scare,
translation.zh:
‎我们的特技协调员史蒂夫
‎对病毒有些恐慌

translation.en: so he is going to be joining us on Zoom today.
translation.zh:
‎所以今天他会以视频会议的方式
‎陪我们拍摄

translation.en: -Oh, it takes so long to shoot action. -Steve!
translation.zh:
‎-拍动作场景要花很长时间
‎-史蒂夫！

translation.en: Hey, guys! Hope everybody's excited for today's stunt sequence.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 大家好！希望今天的特技镜头
‎让大家热情高涨

translation.en: Uh, Steve, looks like you lost some weight. [chuckles]
I'm the same weight as always.
All right, uh, let's go through the scene.
Okay, you know what? Let's run it. Just as we rehearsed, it's gonna be…
translation.zh: ‎好的 开始吧 就像排练的那样 就是…

translation.en: [voice breaking] I froze. I'm frozen. Did I freeze?
translation.zh: ‎我卡住了 ‎我卡住了 我刚才卡住了吗？

translation.en: Fucking bullshit! I told you it wouldn't work!
[voice breaking] Am I clear now? Am I coming in clear?
translation.zh: ‎都清楚了吗？我都说清楚了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Go ahead.
Here's how it goes. The action starts when Dustin engages the first iceman.
translation.zh:
‎是这样的 动作戏从达斯汀
‎制服第一个冰人开始

translation.en: Typical hand-to-hand combat. Remember, parry, jab, end up with a naked choke.
translation.zh:
‎经典的肉搏战 记住
‎格挡闪避、刺拳 然后以裸绞结束

translation.en: Okay, take me over to the mound.
On the mound, Carol's gonna take out icemen four and five
translation.zh: ‎在土堆上 卡罗尔会丢几颗炸弹

translation.en: with a series of explosions.
Dieter and Krystal, you're providing cover fire for the icemen,
translation.zh:
‎迪特尔和克丽丝托
‎你们提供对战冰人的火力掩护

translation.en: [voice breaking] and, Sean, you're gonna walk--
Question. When I'm supposed to get to my mark, do I turn to my left?
translation.zh:
‎问题 我该怎么到达我的位置
‎我要向左转吗？

translation.en: Okay, first team, walking on! Let's do this!
translation.zh: ‎好的 第一组 动起来！开拍吧！

translation.en: Watch out! Watch out!
[chuckles] I'd see that movie!
I forgot to tell you that my dad sucks at stunts.
translation.zh: ‎我忘记跟你说了 我爸做特技很烂

translation.en: Sorry, think I grabbed the wrong wire. Let's do another one-- No!
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我好像抓错绳子了
‎我们趁现在再拍…不！

translation.en: [man] Bloody hell.
I was checking my email real quick. How'd it go?
translation.zh: ‎我刚才看了一下邮件 拍得如何？

translation.en: Um… Not very well. We might have to…
-Do another take, yeah. -[Sean groaning]
I want you to call the studio and tell them to fuck off!
translation.zh:
‎我要你给电影公司打电话
‎让他们滚蛋！

translation.en: Well, what happens then when I need to get a bigger trailer for Mark Ruffalo,
translation.zh:
‎那以后我要是想给马克鲁弗洛
‎争取到长点的预告片该怎么办？

translation.en: I ask 'em and they say, "You just told us to fuck off for Carol"?
translation.zh:
‎如果我找他们 他们会说：
‎“你之前替卡罗尔出气 让我们滚蛋”

translation.en: -I can't do that, okay? -Do I have a hard out date on my contract?
translation.zh:
‎-我做不到 好吗？
‎-我的合同上有硬性结束日期吗？

translation.en: -No. -So they could just make me work forever.
translation.zh:
‎-没有
‎-那他们就可以永远剥削我

translation.en: No, not forever. They're not monsters! They're just trying to make a good movie.
translation.zh:
‎不 不是永远 他们不是怪物！
‎他们只是想拍一部好电影

translation.en: We're being mistreated!
Oh, spare me! You're being "actress-mistreated."
translation.zh:
‎放过我吧！
‎你是以女演员的身份受欺负

translation.en: I'm being fucking human being-mistreated!
translation.zh: ‎而我是以一个活生生的人受欺负！

translation.en: You ever try to teach a 12-year-old math? It's impossible, okay?
translation.zh:
‎你有没有试过教12岁的孩子数学？
‎难于上青天 好吗？

translation.en: He's been shut up in his room.
I walked in there the other day, and he was watching Japanese taxi porn.
translation.zh:
‎有一天我走进去
‎他正在看日本出租车黄片

translation.en: What is Japanese taxi porn?
Just what it sounds like.
They fuck the taxi driver halfway through the video, in Japan!
translation.zh:
‎在日本 视频播到一半
‎出租车司机就会被操！

translation.en: I need you to call the studio and tell them to stop mistreating us.
translation.zh:
‎我需要你给电影公司打电话
‎告诉他们别再欺负我们

translation.en: Otherwise, I'm out. I'm walking.
translation.zh: ‎否则我就退出 离开这里

translation.en: You walk off the film now,
you are financially responsible for any overages that you create.
translation.zh:
‎就要为自己造成的所有超支
‎负经济责任

translation.en: What? What does that mean?
It means that if you leave the movie, you will owe them 114 million bucks.
translation.zh:
‎意思就是 如果你退出电影
‎就会欠他们1.14亿美元

translation.en: I didn't know that was in there!
I didn't either. I didn't read your contract!
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道 我没读你的合同！

translation.en: You're not being a good agent or a good friend.
translation.zh:
‎你不是称职的经纪人
‎也不是称职的朋友

translation.en: I'm being a very good agent. And you know what? I'm not your friend.
translation.zh:
‎我是一个很称职的经纪人
‎还有 你知道吗？我不是你的朋友

translation.en: It's something we pretend when there isn't a pandemic.
translation.zh: ‎那是我们在疫情没爆发时维持的假象

translation.en: -I gotta go. It's Mark Ruffalo. -Don't hang up--
translation.zh:
‎-我要挂了 是马克鲁弗洛
‎-别挂…

translation.en: Hey, Mark.
Oh, my God, you're in the pool.
How you doing?
I thought today was so good.
You did?
-Did you not? -No! Today was a disaster.
translation.zh:
‎-你不觉得吗？
‎-不！今天就是场灾难

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Everyone got injured in the stunt!
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-所有人都在拍特技时受伤了！

translation.en: I mean before the stunt. The scene that we did before was incredible.
translation.zh:
‎我说的是特技之前
‎我们之前拍的那场戏非常精彩

translation.en: That was genius, but everybody got really hurt.
translation.zh:
‎对 那场戏确实很有才
‎但今天大家都伤得不轻

translation.en: Yeah, that was unfortunate for sure. I'm gonna talk to them tomorrow.
translation.zh:
‎对 这当然很不幸
‎我明天会跟大家谈谈

translation.en: I just… Honestly, I don't think I have anything left to give.
translation.zh:
‎我只是…说实话
‎我觉得自己筋疲力竭了

translation.en: I'm so sorry about that.
I guess I was so focused on the dinosaurs, I forgot there are human beings involved.
translation.zh:
‎大概是我太过关注恐龙
‎而忘记这部电影里也有人类了

translation.en: Right.
Yeah. I'm gonna talk to Gavin. I'm gonna really change things so that you're happy.
translation.zh:
‎好 我会跟加文谈谈
‎我真的会做出改变 让你们满意

translation.en: I am mortified.
Really? That would be a lifesaver!
Carol, I'm really sorry.
[Darren] I'm gonna fix this.
-Hey. -Oh, my God!
-I'll race you. Come on! -Hey!
Come on. Try and catch me! [laughing]
Marco!
Hey, Darren. What's up here?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 达伦 这怎么回事？

translation.en: These are not my pages.
Yeah, um, we decided we're just… We're not gonna shoot those.
translation.zh: ‎我们决定…我们不拍那些戏了

translation.en: They weren't good, so we're gonna go and shoot the original script,
translation.zh: ‎写得不太好 所以我们要拍原始剧本

translation.en: also known as the real script that was approved by the studio.
translation.zh: ‎也就是电影公司批准的真正剧本

translation.en: Also known as the worst fucking draft!
Everybody agrees that my revisions are kicking ass.
translation.zh: ‎大家都赞同我的修改非常完美

translation.en: They clarify our pro-environmental message.
translation.zh: ‎这些修改阐明了我们支持环保的意图

translation.en: People don't care about the environment.
People go to see the movies to see dinosaurs blow up and die.
translation.zh: ‎这电影的看点是恐龙被炸死

translation.en: Why? Because dinosaurs kill people. They're monsters!
translation.zh:
‎为什么？因为恐龙会杀死人
‎它们是怪物！

translation.en: We need a movie with heart. [hesitates] Ask Martha. Martha?
translation.zh:
‎我们需要一部有感情的电影
‎你问问玛莎 玛莎？

translation.en: She's our audience.
Don't the dinosaurs need to live?
I don't care if dinosaurs die, you know? I thought they were dead.
translation.zh:
‎我才不在乎恐龙死不死 知道吗？
‎它们不是早就死了吗？

translation.en: Fine. I'll do your shit word-for-word.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我会一字一句按你的破剧本来

translation.en: That fucking scene we're about to shoot,
I don't know how I'll make it work, but I will 'cause that's what I do.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道自己如何能拍好
‎但我会的 因为这是我的专长

translation.en: I turn shit into gold.
[Gunther] You're meant to slurp those ones back.
Hey, do you know, I heard that the movie is going really badly.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 你们知道吗？
‎我听说这电影拍摄很不顺

translation.en: They're gonna extend for another three months. I can't be happier! [laughs]
translation.zh:
‎他们会多拍三个月
‎我真是太高兴了！

translation.en: The longer these shitbags stay in my hotel,
translation.zh: ‎这些废物在我的酒店待的时间越长

translation.en: the bigger my house is gonna be when they leave.
translation.zh: ‎他们离开后 我的房子就会越大

translation.en: I'm gonna have one of those toilets that shoots water up my ass,
translation.zh: ‎我要买个能给屁股喷水的马桶

translation.en: heats it and dries it for me.
-Ronjon is not touching anything anymore. -[others cheering]
Plus, the more we stay here,
translation.zh: ‎而且 我们在这里待得越久

translation.en: the more Dieter will realize that he doesn't need anything but me.
translation.zh: ‎迪特尔就会越来越明白他只需要我

translation.en: -Ooh! -[Anika] Yes.
-Cheers! Never stop filming! -[Gunther] Never stop filming! Never stop filming!
translation.zh:
‎-干杯！永远不停拍！
‎-永远不停拍！

translation.en: [all] ♪ Go, Cliff Beasts It's your birthday ♪ ♪ Go, Cliff Beasts It's your birthday ♪
translation.zh: ‎加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日

translation.en: -♪ Hey! ♪ -♪ Go, Cliff Beasts, it's your birthday ♪
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！
‎-加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日

translation.en: -♪ Go, Cliff Beasts, it's your birthday ♪ -[Ronjon] ♪ Part one, part two ♪
translation.zh:
‎-加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日
‎-第一部分 ‎-加油 悬崖野兽 今天你过生日
‎-第二部分

translation.en: [Dustin] I'm here.
We're a family.
You've always been my hero.
I know that our love will get us through this nightmare.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我们的爱
‎会带领我们走出这场噩梦

translation.en: And cut!
-[bell ringing] -[Darren] Moving on. Excellent.
Great. That was… I really felt that. That was powerful.
translation.zh:
‎太棒了 刚才…我感受到了
‎很强烈的情感

translation.en: -Did I capture her physicality? -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对她的模仿 我做到形似了吧？

translation.en: Yeah, you're fine. It's just you're six inches too tall.
translation.zh: ‎你还不错 只是你比她高15公分

translation.en: -And you're not my wife. -Okay.
-She got her hand blown off, my wife. -I didn't…
I didn't even go back to help her rehab. I had to finish this fucking movie.
translation.zh:
‎我当初甚至都没回去帮她戒瘾
‎我得拍完这破电影

translation.en: -What asshole does that? -It's a specific situation--
translation.zh:
‎-什么样的混蛋会做出这种事？
‎-这是个具体…

translation.en: -Am I an asshole? -No.
-The fuck am I doing? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎-那我这是在做什么？
‎-我不知道

translation.en: I lost my wife and my adopted child of two years for this?
translation.zh:
‎就为了这电影 我失去了老婆
‎和收养了两年的孩子？

translation.en: All this time I was producing this movie, I should have been producing my family!
translation.zh:
‎制作电影的这段时间
‎我应该好好维系家庭！

translation.en: -Are you a producer? -Uncredited, but everybody knows.
translation.zh:
‎-你是这部电影的制片吗？
‎-我是无名制片 但大家都知道

translation.en: See that?
He's reacting like that because you made him feel something.
translation.zh:
‎-看到没有？
‎-他那样反应 ‎是因为他有感觉 你让他有感觉了

translation.en: -Thank you. -So, well done.
What even was that?
That is called a "storm off." It's a pretty good one.
translation.zh: ‎这叫“怒而离席” 还挺经典的

translation.en: Got any good notes for that, Mr. Sundance?
translation.zh: ‎有什么好建议吗 圣丹斯先生？

translation.en: This is the moment you chose to talk to me?
To come in here and heckle me? You?
We've got a saying about people like you in the business.
They talk about you. A sucky fucking worst actor.
translation.zh:
‎他们会背后议论你
‎一个烂透了的演员

translation.en: You're a sellout. You're ruining everything.
translation.zh: ‎你是个背叛者 害群之马

translation.en: You're making me look bad.
You're a poser!
Just kind of talking and mumbling. That's not acting!
translation.zh:
‎你只是在说话还有嘟囔
‎这不是表演！

translation.en: I'm posing with my Oscar!
translation.zh: ‎那我也是凭着奥斯卡奖装腔作势！

translation.en: Carol!
-Hey! What are you mad about? -I have nothing to do in these scenes.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！你在生什么气？
‎-这几场戏里没有我的戏份

translation.en: They keep trimming me and punishing me. You were gonna talk to the studio.
translation.zh:
‎他们一直删减我的戏份 惩罚我
‎你说过会跟电影公司谈的

translation.en: -I did. -And?
It didn't go well. I think it actually backfired.
translation.zh: ‎不太顺利 反而起到了反作用

translation.en: You're the director! They'll give you whatever you want. They'll listen to you.
translation.zh:
‎你是导演！他们会对你百依百顺
‎他们会听你的

translation.en: No, they will not!
They'll bring in Jon Favreau to finish it and send me home in a body bag.
translation.zh:
‎他们会请乔恩费儒拍完电影
‎然后把我装在尸袋里送回家

translation.en: I don't want to go to directors jail, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我不想进导演黑名单 好吗？

translation.en: -Is everything okay? -[Carol] No.
They cut my lines and won't let me leave. Nobody is looking out for me!
translation.zh:
‎他们删我的台词 还不让我走
‎没有人关照我！

translation.en: That is simply not true, Carol. I am your advocate. I'm your warrior.
translation.zh:
‎这肯定不是真的 卡罗尔
‎我是你的拥护者 我是你的战士！

translation.en: If you could see how hard I work for you
translation.zh:
‎如果你能看到我在幕后
‎在紧闭的门后

translation.en: behind the scenes, behind closed doors, on Zoom!
translation.zh:
‎在视频会议上
‎拼命为你争取就好了！

translation.en: This is bullshit! You make us work when we're sick or injured.
translation.zh:
‎你在扯淡！我们生病或受伤了
‎你还逼我们拍戏

translation.en: That is not okay!
I'm sorry, if I might interject, I just got a call about your grandma.
translation.zh:
‎很抱歉 我打断一下
‎我刚刚接了个关于你奶奶的电话

translation.en: -Okay, what? -She died.
What?
Yeah, she's dead. Um, in her sleep, so…
translation.zh: ‎对 她去世了 在睡梦中 所以…

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -[Pippa] I'm sorry as well.
-[Gavin] I'm so sorry. -Okay.
Uh, so I think I need to go be with my family right now.
translation.zh: ‎那我觉得自己现在应该陪着家人

translation.en: That's just not gonna be possible, Carol.
Then make it possible.
You're not the only one suffering loss! My dog got run over.
translation.zh:
‎你不是唯一饱受丧亲之痛的人！
‎我的狗狗被碾死了

translation.en: Did I burden everybody here with it? No. I grieved alone.
translation.zh:
‎我给片场的各位带来负担了吗？
‎没有 我独自哀悼！

translation.en: Mmm. I had to abandon my cat on the street just to shoot this movie.
translation.zh:
‎为了拍这部电影
‎我得丢弃自己的猫 让它流落街头

translation.en: I got a friend going through a really hard time, and I can't be there.
translation.zh:
‎我有个朋友正在经历非常艰难的时期
‎我都没办法陪他

translation.en: His movie didn't open and he's depressed.
translation.zh: ‎他的电影没开拍 他很抑郁

translation.en: -How old was your grandma? -She was 97.
Well, that's sad, but life has to go on. And the show has to go on.
translation.zh:
‎真令人难过 但生活必须继续
‎拍摄不能停止！

translation.en: You know what? You have become a monster!
-Oh, mask! -[Darren] Oh, shoot!
Yeah, I'm drinking, so…
Dustin, don't be sad. The dailies look great!
translation.zh: ‎达斯汀 别难过 每天的拍摄都不错！

translation.en: Hello, this is Paula from the studio,
translation.zh: ‎你们好 我是电影公司的宝拉

translation.en: and I just wanted to say thank you all for your tremendous sacrifice.
translation.zh: ‎我想谢谢大家付出的巨大牺牲

translation.en: It is worth it.
Hey, Paula, who are you talking to?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 宝拉 你在跟谁说话？

translation.en: Beck! Well, I'm talking to the cast of Cliff Beasts 6!
translation.zh:
‎贝克！我在跟《悬崖野兽6》的
‎演员说话！

translation.en: No way. Action movie? That's one of my favorite action movie franchises.
translation.zh:
‎不是吧 动作电影吗？
‎这是我最喜欢的系列动作电影之一

translation.en: Really? Mine too! I hear they have some downtime.
translation.zh:
‎真的吗？我也是！
‎我听说他们停工了

translation.en: Maybe you wanna play 'em some funky grooves.
translation.zh: ‎或许你可以给他们演唱几首放克歌曲

translation.en: Playing funky grooves is what I do best. Who's in the mood for a ladies' night?
translation.zh:
‎我最擅长演唱放克歌曲了
‎谁想来个女士之夜？

translation.en: I know I am. Ladies and gentlemen, Beck.
translation.zh: ‎我想！女士们 先生们 欢迎贝克

translation.en: How's everybody feeling? You all look so sexy tonight!
translation.zh: ‎大家感觉如何？你们今晚都很性感！

translation.en: The studio wanted to show their appreciation
translation.zh: ‎电影公司想表示他们的感谢之情

translation.en: by having me turn this motherfucker out!
Whoo! Thank you for fulfilling your contracts!
♪ Only 37 more days of shooting And we got this one in the can! ♪
translation.zh:
‎再有37天的拍摄
‎这部电影就杀青了！

translation.en: Beck! Whoo!
Everybody get up out of your seats. Get up out of your seats! Come on!
translation.zh: ‎大家都站起来 快站起来！

translation.en: ♪ Girls, y'all got the one ♪
translation.zh: ‎姑娘们 你们都可以享受

translation.en: ♪ A night that's special everywhere ♪
♪ From New York… ♪ ♪ To Hollywood ♪
♪ It's ladies' night And, girl, the feeling's good ♪
translation.zh: ‎女士之夜 姑娘们都迈开舞步

translation.en: ♪ Oh, yes, it's ladies' night ♪
♪ And the feeling's right ♪
♪ Oh, yes, it's ladies' night ♪
♪ Oh, what a night… ♪
What a night!
Fuck it, let's dance!
♪ And the feeling's right ♪
♪ Oh, yes, it's ladies' night Oh, what a night ♪
translation.zh:
‎没错 今晚是女士之夜
‎今夜真美好

translation.en: ♪ Romantic cliff beasts ♪
♪ You have a T. rex ♪
♪ Sophisticated raptor… ♪
[groans] Son of a bitch!
Walk away!
♪ Come play with me tonight, mama ♪
translation.zh: ‎今晚和我一起欢度吧 美女

translation.en: ♪ This is your night tonight… ♪
Fuck this place! Whoo!
♪ This is your night tonight ♪
♪ Everything's gonna be all right ♪
♪ This is your night tonight ♪
♪ Everything's gonna be all right ♪
♪ This is your night tonight ♪
♪ Everything's gonna be ♪
I'm on set joined by the amazing cast of Cliff Beasts 6.
translation.zh:
‎我在《悬崖野兽6》片场
‎采访优秀的演员团队

translation.en: Carol, what's it been like
being back on set with all of your Cliff Beasts buddies?
translation.zh:
‎和《悬崖野兽》的伙伴们团聚
‎你是什么感受？

translation.en: It's great! I find myself smiling the whole time.
translation.zh: ‎感觉很棒！我感觉自己一直在笑

translation.en: My face hurts from all the smiling.
Now, we must take a moment to discuss the difficult times we're all in.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要花些时间讨论一下
‎大家都经历的这段艰难时光

translation.en: [interviewer] Do any of you have a thought about what we can do
translation.zh:
‎你们当中有没有谁想过
‎我们该怎么做

translation.en: to solve the problems that plague our world right now?
translation.zh: ‎解决此时正肆虐全球的疫情吗？

translation.en: I have some good news for the world, and I think it might help a little bit.
translation.zh:
‎我有个好消息要向全世界宣布
‎或许能帮上一点忙

translation.en: Uh, the studio just decided that since we're doing such a great job,
translation.zh:
‎电影公司刚刚决定
‎既然拍摄如此顺利

translation.en: we're gonna roll right into shooting Cliff Beasts 7.
translation.zh:
‎我们会直接进行
‎《悬崖野兽7》的拍摄

translation.en: -[Sean] Amazing! -What?
As soon as we complete 6!
What do you mean? I didn't sign up for Cliff Beasts 7!
translation.zh:
‎什么意思？
‎我没签《悬崖野兽7》的合同！

translation.en: -Oh, it's the same shoot. -No. I'm not doing that.
translation.zh:
‎-是同一个拍摄任务
‎-不行 我不拍

translation.en: I am out. Not doing it! No.
Is this live?
Hello, can you hear me? Please help us, okay?
translation.zh:
‎大家好 能听到我说话吗？
‎帮帮我们 好吗？

translation.en: They are holding us against our will. I can't do another movie.
translation.zh:
‎他们违背我们的意愿囚禁我们
‎我不可能再拍一部电影

translation.en: -I can't! It's not safe here, okay? -[switch clicks]
translation.zh: ‎我做不到！这里不安全 好吗？

translation.en: What the fuck happened to the lights? Can somebody turn those back on?
translation.zh: ‎我做不到！这里不安全 好吗？ ‎灯怎么灭了？谁能开一下灯吗？

translation.en: -What? -It's not live.
-[Carol] What? -It's not live.
-We're not live. -[Carol] Oh.
[Carol] Hey, Krystal's Kittens. You may not know me,
translation.zh:
‎嘿 克丽丝托的可可粉们 ‎你们或许不认识我
‎但我是克丽丝托的一个密友

translation.en: but I am a really close friend of Krystal's.
translation.zh:
‎你们或许不认识我
‎但我是克丽丝托的一个密友

translation.en: I know we are all struggling during this time,
but the Cliff Beasts cast is being held against its will, partially,
translation.zh:
‎但《悬崖野兽》的演员
‎算是在非自愿的情况下被扣押

translation.en: and forced to complete a film under very inhumane conditions.
translation.zh:
‎被迫在非常不人道的条件下
‎完成一部电影

translation.en: Lauren Van Chance got her hand shot off,
and they are making us work through influenza!
translation.zh: ‎他们让我们在患流感的情况下工作！

translation.en: So we need you to jump on Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, even LinkedIn,
translation.zh:
‎我们需要你们在照片墙、抖音、推特
‎甚至领英上声援我们

translation.en: and demand that they allow us to go home.
With full pay. And no repercussions.

translation.en: Who the fuck is that?
Don't insult my mocap men!
translation.zh: ‎不要侮辱我的动作捕捉演员！

translation.en: You know what, guys? As soon as we wrap, I'm gonna punch you both in the jaw.
translation.zh:
‎知道吗 各位？我们一拍完
‎我就给你们俩下巴都来一拳

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna write you a stern bloody email.
translation.zh: ‎我要给你写封严厉警告的邮件

translation.en: Guys! The sooner we get everybody… Where's the cast?
translation.zh: ‎各位！我们越早让大家…演员呢？

translation.en: Where's the fucking cast?
Gavin! Where is everybody?
I don't know.
[amplified] First team, we need you on set. We are not done shooting.
translation.zh:
‎第一组 请回到片场
‎我们还没完成拍摄

translation.en: First fucking team!
Come on, guys! We're losing time!
translation.zh: ‎快回来 各位！我们没时间了！

translation.en: Where's Dustin?
God damn it!
Dustin, you're wanted back on set. Soon as you can make it, that'd be great.
translation.zh: ‎达斯汀 请回到片场 越快回来越好

translation.en: Fucking prick!
Mr. Best, there's been a breach.
I believe the children wanna play!
Okay, let's have some fun.
[hesitates] Can I leave?
No! I'm sorry I'm not Patty Jenkins.
translation.zh: ‎不行！真可惜我不是派蒂杰金斯

translation.en: I don't get to work with fucking Cal Gadot.
translation.zh: ‎我没办法和盖尔加朵一起工作

translation.en: Gotta work with these fucks!
There's some really crazy shit going down on the Cliff Beasts set right now.
I don't even know where to begin.
It's been really hard on set these days--
Hey! What's happening? Has something gone wrong?
Get out of my way.
-Is there something we can do-- -To cheer them up?
translation.zh:
‎-如果有什么我们能做的…
‎-给他们打打气

translation.en: Cheer them up? This'll cheer them up! -This'll cheer them up! -Whoa! -This'll cheer them up! -Aah!
translation.zh: ‎给他们打打气？这样能给他们打气！

translation.en: What are you doing? Crikey!
-Do you want cheering up? -No, I'm-- Do you want cheering up?
I'm on a different film.
-That slowed them down a bit. -Three, four seconds. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这也算是拖了他们一会儿
‎-三 四秒吧

translation.en: What the hell was that?
I'm stopping you. You have a movie to finish.
translation.zh: ‎我在阻止你 ‎我还有电影要拍

translation.en: I thought you were my friend.
I was paid to be your friend!
They paid you?
-I'm a mole! -What are you talking about?
And by the way, you are a mediocre dancer.
translation.zh: ‎对了 你的舞技真的很一般

translation.en: That's my appeal, bitch!
translation.zh: ‎这就是我的魅力所在 贱人！

translation.en: Come on.
Hey. Hey, stop. Hey!
Hey, why are you running?
Hey!
-Hey, stop! -Why are you chasing me?
-Why are you running? -Get the hell away from me!
[Carol] God, get off of me!
-Why were you running? -Why do you care if I'm running?
translation.zh:
‎-你刚才跑什么？
‎-你为什么在乎我跑什么？

translation.en: You could have stolen something.
I didn't steal anything.
I really don't think you're allowed to run during a pandemic.
I have to because it is an emergency.
translation.zh: ‎我必须要跑 因为有紧急情况

translation.en: Great. I have a sore leg, and what do I have to do for the rest of my day? Run.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我腿很疼
‎我这一天接下来还要干什么呢？跑

translation.en: Aw! Somebody get Professor X his wheelchair!
I play a lot of different characters. Not just him!
translation.zh: ‎我演过很多其他角色 ‎不仅仅是他！

translation.en: -You're… -Carol Cobb.
-Carol Cobb. -We went on a date, remember?
translation.zh:
‎-卡罗尔柯布
‎-我们约过会 还记得吗？

translation.en: Oh, wow.
You don't remember--
Oh. Hey, hi.
-They need me back on set. -Nobody's calling you. That's not a phone.
translation.zh:
‎-他们需要我回片场
‎-没人给你打电话 那不是手机

translation.en: [sighs] There's my phone.
Got you now, you dirty hippie.
translation.zh: ‎这下你跑不掉了 下流的嬉皮士

translation.en: [amplified] Hey, get your ass off the set! What are you, crazy?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 从我的片场滚出去！
‎你是疯了吗？

translation.en: Mr. Best!
What? What is it, Gavin?
What now?
Cliff Beasts!
Shit, it's in his hand!
Can I be in Cliff Beasts 7 now I shot him for you?
translation.zh:
‎我都为你射他了
‎可以让我参演《悬崖野兽7》吗？

translation.en: I'll make a call.
Thank you. Sorry about flipping out earlier.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 抱歉我之前抓狂了

translation.en: -There's a lot of stress and emotions. -Just let me enjoy this moment.
translation.zh:
‎-我感觉压力很大 情绪很复杂
‎-让我好好享受此刻

translation.en: -Do you know how to fly that thing? -Yeah, I took eight lessons.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道怎么开这玩意吗？
‎-知道 我上过八节课

translation.en: [Darren] Hey! Where do you think you're going? Huh?
Don't move!
Stay there!
How do the brakes work on this thing? God damn it.
No one's getting in that helicopter!
Turn around.
Turn around, go back to set.
I won Sundance with a movie I made on my phone!
translation.zh:
‎我用手机拍摄的一部电影
‎得过圣丹斯奖！

translation.en: An iPhone 6!
I am not going back to my old life.
You think I want to go back to Home Depot, selling tiles?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得我想回去家得宝卖瓷砖吗？

translation.en: This is my shot!
Your call time is right now!
I got this.
-You got what? This? -You wanna go, Cimino?
translation.zh:
‎-你解决什么？现在这情况吗？
‎-要过过招吗 奇米诺？

translation.en: -Do I wanna go? Yeah. -Come on.
Come on.
You wanna play around? Is that what you want?
[Carol] Yeah.
What are they doing?
I'm pretty sure it's the tribesmen fight from the movie.
translation.zh: ‎我很确定这是电影里的部落大战

translation.en: -Oh. This is a terrible fight. -[Dustin] Go again?
-All right. -From the top?
Grab. Block away, one punch, second punch. Down, stomach. Duck.
translation.zh:
‎抓住 挡住 一拳 两拳
‎往下 打肚子 躲开

translation.en: The fight I was just in was way better than this.
translation.zh: ‎我刚才打的那架都比这激烈得多

translation.en: Attaboy.
-Give me that! -Yeah!
Should we stop it?
Probably not. No one's getting hurt.
Shit! Dustin, just do something different! Anything!
translation.zh:
‎该死！达斯汀 用点不一样的招式！
‎什么都可以！

translation.en: All right. Here's a page one rewrite.
translation.zh: ‎好的 这是重写的第一页

translation.en: On your balls!
-[Darren groans] -There it is!
-Yeah! That's different. -Hit to the face!
Yeah!
-Attaboy, Dustin! -Let's go.
-[groans] -[Sean] Dieter! Dieter, come on!
You should have gone with my pages.
translation.zh: ‎你应该照我重写的剧本拍的

translation.en: All right, now this…
That's done. Okay, all right, this goes…
translation.zh: ‎这个好了 好的 这个要…

translation.en: [Carol] Oh, my God.
My cast! [groans]
[Dieter] Anika,
you made it okay!
I got in here three hours early just to be safe.
translation.zh: ‎安全起见 我提前三个小时就到了

translation.en: I wanna live with you. I wanna live with you in Beverly Hills.
translation.zh:
‎我想跟你一起生活
‎我想跟你住在比弗利山庄

translation.en: -I live in Sherman Oaks. -Even better!
translation.zh:
‎-我住在谢尔曼奥克斯
‎-那样更好！

translation.en: -You got this? -Yeah.
-Whoo! -No celebrating yet.
-Okay, no, we-- -[Dustin] Fly it.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 不 我们…
‎-快起飞

translation.en: Oh, man, this is a rush!
All right!
Yes!
Why are we standing still?
What are you doing?
-[hesitates] Just hold on-- -[Dustin] Let's get going.
Okay, just give me a second. Um…
Okay, what is that one?
I've not seen that button. I do not know what that does.
translation.zh:
‎我没见过这按钮
‎我不知道它有什么作用

translation.en: [Darren] What happens now?
You're definitely gonna get the sack for getting Howie to shoot Mr. Best.
translation.zh:
‎你肯定会因为让豪伊
‎射到贝斯特先生而被开除

translation.en: You'll be in directors jail for the rest of your life, if that. You're finished.
translation.zh:
‎你这辈子最多会待在
‎导演黑名单上下不来 你完蛋了

translation.en: And I'm just gonna take over as producer and get the movie in the can.
translation.zh:
‎然后我会以制片人的身份接手
‎把电影拍完

translation.en: What are you doing?
Uh, I only know how to go up and down.
What?
For the movie, they only taught me how to go up and down.
translation.zh: ‎出于拍摄需要 他们只教了我上下飞

translation.en: They didn't teach me how to go forward.
I don't know how to move forward, okay? I'm just, uh… I don't know what else to do.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道怎么前进 好吗？
‎我…我不知道还能怎么做

translation.en: Just push it forward!
Well, I don't know if that's how it works. It might be how it works. I don't know!
translation.zh:
‎我不知道会不会有用
‎可能是这个原理 我不知道！

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -What is happening?
Krystal, go on YouTube. See if there's a helicopter tutorial or something!
translation.zh:
‎克丽丝托 上YouTube
‎看有没有直升机教程！

translation.en: Does YouTube still exist?
-Yes! -Yes, YouTube exists!
-It still exists! -Okay!
-Um… -Hurry, Krystal.
What? What are you looking at?
[Krystal] It's a monkey being washed in a sink.
translation.zh:
‎-是一只猴子在水槽里洗澡
‎-它在洗澡

translation.en: -[Dustin] It's taking a bath. -[Sean] What's happening?
translation.zh:
‎-是一只猴子在水槽里洗澡
‎-它在洗澡 ‎怎么了？

translation.en: -It's a monkey. -A monkey taking a bath?
-Look, he's so cute! -Let me see.
I don't think he likes it!
-Aw! His fur is so soapy! -[alarm beeping]
-Stop this! -Stop!
[Sean] Krystal, show me!
Hurry! Let's go!
Stop yelling at me! Go, just watch it!
Today, I'd like to talk to you about how to fly a helicopter.
translation.zh:
‎今天 我想跟大家聊聊
‎怎样驾驶直升机

translation.en: Why don't we hop in and I'll show you how it works?
translation.zh:
‎我们一起上直升机
‎我给大家展示一下如何操作吧

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Oh.
It's a prop. It doesn't work.
I just thought maybe this could scare them into coming back.
translation.zh:
‎我就是想着
‎这样或许能把他们吓回来

translation.en: -Okay, I think I got it. -Darren is pointing a gun at us right now!
translation.zh:
‎-好吧 我应该学会了
‎-达伦在用枪指着我们！

translation.en: -[Carol] Oh, my God! We gotta go. Go! -[Sean] Okay. Uh-huh.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得…
‎-我们要赶紧走 ‎-快走
‎-好的

translation.en: Sean, I believe in you.
You can do this.
I wanna be the hero, but I can't do it.
translation.zh: ‎我想做英雄 但我做不到

translation.en: Come on, guys, we're a family!
translation.zh: ‎来吧 各位 我们是一家人！

translation.en: Let's do this together.
[Dustin] Come on.
All right. Okay, guys, here we go.
We're doing it. We're doing it. We're moving forward.
translation.zh: ‎我们做到了 我们在往前飞了

translation.en: No, we're good! We're good! We're good! We're good!
We're good. I've got it. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎我们没事 我可以的 好了

translation.en: So how are you doing? This seems like a major setback.
translation.zh: ‎你们感觉如何？这好像是个重大挫折

translation.en: We're gonna be fine! We'll put a cut together. It's gonna be great.
translation.zh:
‎我们会好起来的！
‎我们会剪个片子出来 效果一定很好

translation.en: We're not done. They'll probably come back!
translation.zh: ‎我们还没完呢 他们可能会回来！

translation.en: I think I got it, everyone.
We're going home.
[Bola] You sons of bitches, you didn't tip us!
translation.zh: ‎你们这些狗杂种 不接上我们！

translation.en: -[Carol] Oh, my God! -Bye-bye, Clifton!
-Bye! -Whoo-hoo!
I'm Susan Howard, reporting live
translation.zh: ‎我是苏珊霍华德 此刻正在直播

translation.en: from the premiere of a documentary about a disastrous production
translation.zh:
‎一部讲述命运多舛的电影拍摄的
‎纪录片首映礼

translation.en: that the entire nation is talking about.
I'm a beast!
[both] We're a beast!
[all] I'm a beast!
-[both] I'm a beast! -I ain't a fucking cliff beast.
translation.zh:
‎-我是野兽！
‎-我才不是悬崖野兽

translation.en: -Let's get ready to bubble! -Bubble!
[Dustin] Cliff Beasts 6?
Holy shit.
When Howie cracked, that's when we all should have just gotten out of there.
translation.zh: ‎豪伊崩溃的时候 我们就该离开的

translation.en: And here's a warning. Do not leak this on the Internet, you fucking idiots.
translation.zh:
‎我警告你们 不要泄露到网上
‎你们这些蠢蛋

translation.en: -[Krystal] The security was insane. -[yelling]
They had guns.
It felt like America, but in England.
translation.zh: ‎感觉像是美国 但其实是在英国

translation.en: The second these things go to streamers, they're gonna be watched on televisions,
translation.zh:
‎这些东西一旦进入流媒体
‎就会出现在电视上

translation.en: and then that makes me a television star.
I'm not a television star! I am a movie star!
translation.zh: ‎我不是电视明星！我是电影明星！

translation.en: What do you think I am? Young Sheldon?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得我是谁？小谢尔顿吗？

translation.en: -No, don't leave me! -Let go!
Not now. Turn that off, you tit!
translation.zh: ‎现在别拍了 关掉 你这傻瓜！

translation.en: Yeah, the cast all called me EPK Guy.
translation.zh:
‎对 演员们都叫我
‎负责电子版发行包的人

translation.en: It's like, "That's not my name. My name is Scott."
translation.zh: ‎“我不叫这个名字 我叫斯科特”

translation.en: Now they know it. It's on the fucking poster.
translation.zh:
‎现在他们知道了
‎我的名字就在海报上

translation.en: How does it feel to be the villain of Beasts of the Bubble?
translation.zh:
‎当《泡泡野兽》中的反派
‎是什么感觉？

translation.en: [chuckling] I'm not the villain. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: ‎我不是反派 你在说什么？

translation.en: Why are you complaining? I can't leave and have almost no lines.
translation.zh:
‎你为什么要抱怨？我都不能走
‎而且一句台词都没有

translation.en: I'm over here with my dick in my hands like a piece-of-shit extra!
translation.zh:
‎我在这里 手里握着我的老二
‎就像一坨多余的屎！

translation.en: No, I didn't know that all my Zoom calls were being recorded.
translation.zh:
‎不 我不知道自己所有的视频通话
‎都被录下来了

translation.en: I could sue, but I won't 'cause I'm in on the joke,
translation.zh:
‎我可以起诉 但我不会的
‎因为我是知情人

translation.en: and I love the joke.
So you're the mole!
[chuckling] I know! I'm the mole.
I never thought it could work as just a hand.
High five.
See?
Sean, how are you doing?
I heard you just got out of rehab for cocaine addiction.
translation.zh: ‎我听说你刚刚结束可卡因戒毒

translation.en: Yes, two-day rehab. I walked in one day. I said, "I think I'm addicted to cocaine."
translation.zh:
‎是的 两天的戒毒 我有一天过去那里
‎我说：“我好像染上了可卡因毒瘾”

translation.en: They said, "You shouldn't do that anymore." I said, "Done."
translation.zh:
‎他们说：“你不能再嗑药了”
‎我说：“没问题”

translation.en: -Two days, huh? -48 hours.
What's your next project, Darren?
translation.zh: ‎你下个项目是什么 达伦？

translation.en: I'm doing the Skittles movie.
It's based on the candy. It's got a great story. A passion project.
translation.zh:
‎以糖果为题材 很出彩的故事
‎我是出于热爱才拍的

translation.en: And it's about racism and diversity, and how we can all get along.
translation.zh:
‎这片子涉及到种族主义和多样性
‎以及人类如何共处

translation.en: It's all the flavors, but it all goes under one name. Skittles.
translation.zh:
‎电影包含所有口味
‎但都可以用一个名字概括 彩虹糖

translation.en: So much exciting news for the two of you. And who's this?
translation.zh: ‎你们两个真是好消息不断 这是谁？

translation.en: This is our friend, Kate.
I have no idea why I'm here.
Come on, Kate.
Come on.
I'm a beast!
-Come on, Rafi, just say it with me. -No, get off me!
translation.zh:
‎-来啊 拉斐 跟我一起说
‎-不要 放开我！

translation.en: So how have you been doing since the movie?
translation.zh: ‎拍完电影后 你近况如何？

translation.en: Um, yeah, good.
Um, so I'm worried I'm gonna get in trouble
because I didn't send the swabs off to get tested.
translation.zh: ‎因为我没有把棉签送去做检测

translation.en: Um, so I've still got most of them at home.
And even now I don't really know where to send them. If you know?
translation.zh:
‎我到现在都还不知道该送去哪
‎你知道吗？

translation.en: No? Thank you.
Do you think they have enough footage in the can to put a cut together?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得他们有足够的录像
‎剪成一部片子吗？

translation.en: We didn't get any of the opening,
but maybe that doesn't matter as long as the ending's strong.
translation.zh:
‎但只要结局足够猛烈
‎或许就没什么关系

translation.en: Yeah. The rest of the movie can be shit as long as the ending's good
translation.zh:
‎对 只要结局够好
‎其他部分都是垃圾也无所谓

translation.en: 'cause that's what they'll remember. You know?
Oh, yeah.
Well, at least we tried to make a movie.
translation.zh: ‎至少我们为拍出这部电影努力过

translation.en: They can't judge us for that.
We made something that's a distraction in these difficult times.
translation.zh:
‎我们创作了一部作品
‎在艰难时期帮大家分分心

translation.en: It's really hard to direct in these things.
translation.zh: ‎这种情况下 导演电影真的很难
